atk-vin02a4:7_0: Saṅgahaṃ yo samāruḷho, tassa pubbāgataṃ nayaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:9_2: paññattanti ādinayappavattāya tāva pucchāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-vin02a4:9_3: yo so bhagavā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitikatthaṃ dhammasenāpatinā saddhammagāravabahumānavegasamussitaṃ añjaliṃ
atk-vin02a4:9_4: sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā yācito dasa atthavase paṭicca vinayapaññattiṃ paññapesi,
atk-vin02a4:9_5: tena bhagavatā tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa paññattikālaṃ jānatā,
atk-vin02a4:9_6: tassā tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā dasa atthavase passatā;
atk-vin02a4:9_9: tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-vin02a4:9_12: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatāni cāpi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā ca passatā,
atk-vin02a4:10_1: Pucchāvissajjane pana “yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājika”nti
atk-vin02a4:10_2: idaṃ kevalaṃ pucchāya āgatassa ādipadassa paccuddharaṇamattameva,
atk-vin02a4:10_4: kaṃ ārabbhāti sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ ārabbhā”ti evamādinā pana nayena punapi ettha ekekaṃ padaṃ pucchitvāva vissajjitaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:10_5: Ekā paññattīti “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti ayaṃ ekā paññatti.
atk-vin02a4:10_9: Ettāvatā “atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññattī”ti imissā pucchāya dve koṭṭhāsā vissajjitā honti.
atk-vin02a4:10_10: Tatiyaṃ vissajjetuṃ pana “anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:10_11: Ayañhi anuppannapaññatti nāma anuppanne dose paññattā;
atk-vin02a4:10_15: Sabbatthapaññattīti majjhimadese ceva paccantimajanapadesu ca sabbatthapaññatti.
atk-vin02a4:10_19: cammattharaṇa”nti imāni hi cattāri sikkhāpadāni majjhimadeseyeva paññatti.
atk-vin02a4:11_1: suddhabhikkhūnameva hi suddhabhikkhunīnaṃ vā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ asādhāraṇapaññatti nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:11_2: Idaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
atk-vin02a4:11_3: antamaso tiracchānagatenapi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā”ti bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:12_0: Nidānogadhanti “yassa siyā āpatti so āvikareyyā”ti ettha sabbāpattīnaṃ anupaviṭṭhattā nidānogadhaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:12_2: Dutiyena uddesenāti nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannampi samānaṃ “tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādinā dutiyeneva uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati.
atk-vin02a4:12_4: Paṭhamā hi dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipatti nāma,
atk-vin02a4:12_6: Micchādiṭṭhi ca antaggāhikadiṭṭhi ca diṭṭhivipatti nāma,
atk-vin02a4:12_7: ājīvahetu paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni ājīvavipatti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:12_8: Iti imāsaṃ catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ idaṃ pārājikaṃ sīlavipatti nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:13_3: Tena vuttaṃ “kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:13_4: Dvīhi samathehi sammatīti “āpannosī”ti sammukhā pucchiyamāno “āma āpannomhī”ti paṭijānāti,
atk-vin02a4:13_6: sakkā ca hoti taṃ puggalaṃ apanetvā uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā kātuṃ.
atk-vin02a4:13_7: Iti sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena cāti dvīhi samathehi sammati,
atk-vin02a4:13_8: na ca tappaccayā koci upaddavo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:13_9: Yaṃ pana upari paññattivagge “na katamena samathena sammatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:13_10: taṃ samathaṃ otāretvā anāpatti kātuṃ na sakkāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:14_0: Paññatti vinayoti “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vuttamātikā paññatti vinayoti attho.
atk-vin02a4:14_5: Yesaṃ vattatīti yesaṃ vinayapiṭakañca aṭṭhakathā ca sabbā paguṇāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:14_6: Te dhārentīti te etaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ pāḷito ca atthato ca dhārenti;
atk-vin02a4:14_7: na hi sakkā sabbaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ ajānantena etassa attho jānitunti.
atk-vin02a4:14_8: Kenābhatanti idaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca yāva ajjatanakālaṃ kena ānītanti.
atk-vin02a4:15_2: taṃ dassetuṃ “upāli dāsako cevā”tiādinā nayena porāṇakehi mahātherehi gāthāyo ṭhapitā.
atk-vin02a4:18_1: Ito paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”ti ādippabhedo katāpattivāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_2: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajantī”ti ādippabhedo vipattivāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_3: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ādippabhedo saṅgahavāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_4: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhahantī”ti ādippabhedo samuṭṭhānavāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_5: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇa”nti ādippabhedo adhikaraṇavāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_6: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammantī”ti ādippabhedo samathavāro,
atk-vin02a4:18_7: tadanantaro samuccayavāro cāti ime satta vārā uttānatthā eva.
atk-vin02a4:19_1: Tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā nayena puna paccayavasena eko paññattivāro,
atk-vin02a4:19_2: tassa vasena purimasadisā eva katāpattivārādayo satta vārāti evaṃ aparepi aṭṭha vārā vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:19_5: purimā aṭṭhāti mahāvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā dassitā.
atk-vin02a4:19_6: Tato paraṃ teneva nayena bhikkhunivibhaṅgepi soḷasa vārā āgatāti evamime ubhatovibhaṅge dvattiṃsa vārā pāḷinayeneva veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:19_7: Na hettha kiñci pubbe avinicchitaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:23_1: Tadanantarāya pana samuṭṭhānakathāya anattā iti nicchayāti anattā iti nicchitā.
atk-vin02a4:23_3: Nāmamattaṃ na nāyatīti nāmamattampi na paññāyati.
atk-vin02a4:23_5: Khandhakā yā ca mātikāti khandhakā yā ca mātikāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:23_7: Samuṭṭhānaṃ niyato katanti samuṭṭhānaṃ niyatokataṃ niyatakataṃ;
atk-vin02a4:24_2: tāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sambhinnasamuṭṭhānāni.
atk-vin02a4:24_4: Sutte dissanti uparīti sikkhāpadānaṃ samuṭṭhānaniyamo sambhedo nidānanti imāni tīṇi suttamhi eva dissanti;
atk-vin02a4:24_7: kāyato ca cittato cā”tiādimhi tāva purimanaye samuṭṭhānaniyamo ca sambhedo ca dissanti.
atk-vin02a4:26_0: Kosambiyā ca sakkesu, bhaggesu ceva paññattā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:27_0: Evaṃ upari dissati, parato āgate sutte dissatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:28_1: yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ dvīsu vibhaṅgesu paññattaṃ uposathadivase bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca uddisanti,
atk-vin02a4:29_3: Lomāni padasodhammoti eḷakalomāni ca padasodhammo ca.
atk-vin02a4:29_4: Bhūtaṃ saṃvidhānena cāti bhūtārocanañca saṃvidahitvā addhānappaṭipajjanañca.
atk-vin02a4:29_5: Theyyadesanā coriṃ cāti theyyasattho ca chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammadesanā ca corivuṭṭhāpanañca.
atk-vin02a4:29_6: Ananuññātāya terasāti mātāpitusāmikehi ananuññātāya saddhiṃ imāni terasa samuṭṭhānāni honti.
atk-vin02a4:29_7: Sadisā idha dissareti idha ubhatovibhaṅge etesu terasasu samuṭṭhānasīsesu ekekasmiṃ aññānipi sadisāni samuṭṭhānāni dissanti.
atk-vin02a4:31_2: Tattha methunanti idaṃ tāva paṭhamapārājikaṃ nāma ekaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:31_4: Tattha sukkasaṃsaggoti sukkavissaṭṭhi ceva kāyasaṃsaggo ca.
atk-vin02a4:31_7: Raho bhikkhuniyā sahāti bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ raho nisajjasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:32_0: Sabhojane raho dve cāti sabhojane kule anupakhajjanisajjasikkhāpadañca dve rahonisajjasikkhāpadāni ca.
atk-vin02a4:32_1: Aṅguli udake hasanti aṅgulipatodakañca udake hasadhammasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:32_3: Tepaññāsā ca sekhiyāti parimaṇḍalanivāsanādīni khuddakavaṇṇanāvasāne vuttāni tepaññāsa sekhiyasikkhāpadāni ca.
atk-vin02a4:33_0: Adhakkhagāmāvassutāti bhikkhunīnaṃ adhakkhakasikkhāpadañca gāmantaragamanaṃ avassutā avassutassa hatthato khādanīyabhojanīyaggahaṇasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:33_2: Vassaṃvuṭṭhā ca ovādanti vassaṃvuṭṭhā chappañcayojanāni sikkhāpadañca ovādāya agamanasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:33_3: Nānubandhe pavattininti yā pana bhikkhunī vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyyāti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:34_0: Ime sikkhāti imā sikkhāyo; liṅgavipariyāyo kato. Kāyamānasikā katāti kāyacittasamuṭṭhānā katā.
atk-vin02a4:36_1: Adinnanti idaṃ tāva adinnādānanti vā dutiyapārājikanti vā ekaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:37_0: Acchinde pariṇāmaneti sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā acchindanañca saṅghikalābhassa attano pariṇāmanañca.
atk-vin02a4:37_1: Musā omasapesuṇāti musāvādo ca omasavādo ca bhikkhupesuññañca.
atk-vin02a4:38_0: Nikkaḍḍhanaṃ siñcanañcāti vihārato nikkaḍḍhanañca udakena tiṇādisiñcanañca.
atk-vin02a4:38_3: Ehi anādari bhiṃsāti “ehāvuso gāmaṃ vā”ti sikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:39_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ kammanti jānaṃ sappāṇakaudakasikkhāpadañca punakammāya ukkoṭanañca.
atk-vin02a4:39_1: Ūnasaṃvāsanāsanāti ūnavīsativassasikkhāpadañca ukkhittakena saddhiṃ saṃvāsasikkhāpadañca nāsitakasāmaṇerasambhogasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:40_3: Pariṇāmeyya puggaleti saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ puggalassa pariṇāmanasikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:40_4: Kiṃ te akālaṃ acchindeti “kiṃ te ayye eso purisapuggalo karissatī”ti āgatasikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:40_7: Duggahī nirayena cāti duggahitena duppadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpanasikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:41_0: Gaṇaṃ vibhaṅga dubbalanti “gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyyā”ti ca “dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāheyyā”ti
atk-vin02a4:41_4: bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍheyya vā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:41_5: Akkosacaṇḍī maccharīti “bhikkhuṃ akkoseyya vā paribhāseyya vā,
atk-vin02a4:42_0: Dvevassaṃ sikkhā saṅghenāti “dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
atk-vin02a4:42_1: sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:42_3: paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ “dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ dve vassāni sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammata”nti vuttasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:42_4: Kumāribhūtā tissoti “ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūta”ntiādinā nayena vuttā tisso.
atk-vin02a4:43_0: Alaṃ tāva sokāvāsanti “alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti ca,
atk-vin02a4:43_2: Chandā anuvassā ca dveti “pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
atk-vin02a4:45_1: Sañcarī kuṭi vihāroti sañcarittaṃ saññācikāya kuṭikaraṇaṃ mahallakavihārakaraṇañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_2: Dhovanañca paṭiggahoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaradhovāpanañca cīvarapaṭiggahaṇañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_3: Viññattuttari abhihaṭṭhunti aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ cīvaraviññāpanaṃ tatuttarisādiyanasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:45_4: Ubhinnaṃ dūtakena cāti “cīvaracetāpannaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ hotī”ti āgatasikkhāpadadvayañca dūtena cīvaracetāpannapahitasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:46_2: Riñcanti rūpikā cevāti vibhaṅge “riñcanti uddesa”nti āgataṃ eḷakalomadhovāpanaṃ rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:47_1: Suttaṃ vikappanena cāti suttaṃ viññāpetvā cīvaravāyāpanañca tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappāpajjanañca.
atk-vin02a4:47_5: Pūvapaccayajoti cāti pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ cātumāsapaccayappavāraṇājotisamādahanasikkhāpadāni ca.
atk-vin02a4:48_2: vassikā ca sugatenāti ratanasikkhāpadañceva sūcigharasikkhāpadādīni ca satta sikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:48_5: dve puggalalahukā garūti “yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyyā”tiādīni nava sikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:48_6: Dve vighāsā sāṭikā cāti “uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā,
atk-vin02a4:48_7: harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā”ti evaṃ vuttāni dve vighāsasikkhāpadāni ca udakasāṭikāsikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:48_8: Samaṇacīvarena cāti “samaṇacīvaraṃ dadeyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:50_2: Chandaṃ ujjagghikā dve cāti chandaṃ adatvā gamanasikkhāpadaṃ ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamananisīdanasikkhāpadadvayañca.
atk-vin02a4:50_5: Na byāhareti “na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmī”ti sikkhāpadaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:51_9: Osāre paccācikkhanāti “anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāreyyā”ti ca “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:52_0: Kismiṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve vadhīti “kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā”ti ca “bhikkhuniyo paneva saṃsaṭṭhā viharantī”ti
atk-vin02a4:52_1: ca “yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya saṃsaṭṭhāva ayye tumhe viharathā”ti ca “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā
atk-vin02a4:52_3: Visibbe dukkhitāya cāti “bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā”ti ca “dukkhitaṃ sahajīvini”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:52_4: Puna saṃsaṭṭhā na vūpasameti “saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā”ti evaṃ puna vuttasaṃsaṭṭhasikkhāpadañca “ehayye,
atk-vin02a4:52_6: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā “sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasammeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:52_7: Ārāmañca pavāraṇāti “jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyyā”ti ca “ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:53_0: Anvaddhaṃ sahajīviniṃ dveti “anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca,
atk-vin02a4:53_5: evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti ca “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye,
atk-vin02a4:55_1: Ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ tīṇīti “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vuttāni āditova tīṇi sikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:55_2: Paṭhamaṃ pattabhesajjanti “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto”ti vuttaṃ paṭhamapattasikkhāpadañca “paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjānī”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:55_4: Pakkamantena vā duveti “taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyyā”ti bhūtagāmavagge vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:56_0: Upassayaṃ paramparāti “bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyyā”ti ca “paramparabhojane pācittiya”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:56_1: Anatirittaṃ nimantanāti “anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti ca “nimantito sabhatto samāno”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:56_2: Vikappaṃ rañño vikāleti “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā”ti ca “rañño khattiyassā”ti ca “vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:56_3: Vosāsāraññakena cāti “vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā”ti ca “tathārūpesu āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃvidita”nti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_0: Ussayā sannicayañcāti “ussayavādikā”ti ca “pattasannicayaṃ kareyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_1: Pure pacchā vikāle cāti “yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā”ti ca,
atk-vin02a4:57_4: Pañcāhikā saṅkamanīti “pañcāhikā saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkameyyā”ti ca “cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhāreyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:57_6: āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyyā”ti ca evaṃ āvasathena saddhiṃ vuttasikkhāpadāni ca dve.
atk-vin02a4:58_0: Pasākhe āsane cevāti “pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā”ti ca “bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:60_1: Eḷakalomā dve seyyāti eḷakalomasikkhāpadañceva dve ca sahaseyyasikkhāpadāni.
atk-vin02a4:60_5: Uyyuttaṃ senaṃ uyyodhīti “uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya,
atk-vin02a4:60_10: Dubbaṇṇe dve desanikāti “tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇāna”nti vuttasikkhāpadañca vuttāvasesapāṭidesanīyadvayañca.
atk-vin02a4:60_12: “bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:60_13: “naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:61_7: pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyyā”ti ca vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:61_8: Āsandiṃ suttakantanāti “āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjeyya,
atk-vin02a4:62_1: agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadadvayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:62_2: Abhikkhukāvāsena cāti “abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vaseyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:62_10: Asaṅkaccikā āpattīti “asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ paviseyya pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttaāpatti ca.
atk-vin02a4:62_11: Cattārīsā catuttarīti etāni sabbānipi catucattālīsa sikkhāpadāni vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:63_1: kāyacittena na vācatoti kāyena ceva kāyacittena ca samuṭṭhahanti;
atk-vin02a4:65_5: Tathā atthaṅgatena cāti “atthaṅgate sūriye ovadeyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:65_8: Anokāso ca pucchanāti “anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyā”ti idametaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:67_1: Addhānanāvaṃ paṇītanti “bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-vin02a4:67_3: paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadattayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:67_4: Mātugāmena saṃhareti mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gamanañca “sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:67_5: Dhaññaṃ nimantitā cevāti “dhaññaṃ viññāpetvā vā”ti ca “nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
atk-vin02a4:67_6: vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
atk-vin02a4:67_7: Aṭṭha cāti bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttā aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā vā.
atk-vin02a4:69_1: Theyyasatthaṃ upassutīti theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggagamanañca upassutitiṭṭhanañca.
atk-vin02a4:69_2: Sūpaviññāpanena cāti idaṃ sūpodanaviññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:69_6: Byūhena sattamāti idaṃ tadanantarameva “rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhi”nti āgatasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:71_5: taṃ visuṃyeva dassetuṃ “bhūtaṃ kāyena jāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:75_1: Idāni āpattiādikoṭṭhāsesu kosallajananatthaṃ “kati āpattiyo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā niddesappaṭiniddesavasena vibhaṅgo vutto.
atk-vin02a4:76_0: Tattha kati āpattiyoti mātikāya ca vibhaṅge ca āgatāpattipucchā.
atk-vin02a4:76_2: Kevalañhettha āpattiyo eva rāsivasena khandhāti vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:76_9: Vinītavatthūnīti ayaṃ pana tesaṃ agāravānaṃ vinayapucchā.
atk-vin02a4:76_10: Yasmā pana tā āpattiyo vipattiṃ āpattā nāma natthi,
atk-vin02a4:76_13: Vivādamūlāni anuvādamūlānīti imā “vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇa”nti āgatānaṃ vivādānuvādānaṃ mūlapucchā.
atk-vin02a4:77_5: Na etāya ete āpattikkhandhā karīyantīti akiriyā.
atk-vin02a4:77_13: So setu etāya paññattiyā haññatīti setughāto.
atk-vin02a4:78_0: Buddhe agāravādīsu yo buddhe dharamāne upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-vin02a4:78_2: cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā na vandati,
atk-vin02a4:78_5: Yo pana sakkontoyeva dhammassavanaṃ na gacchati,
atk-vin02a4:78_15: Tisso sikkhā samādāya asikkhamānoyeva pana sikkhāya agāravoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:78_16: Pamāde ca sativippavāse tiṭṭhamānoyeva appamādalakkhaṇaṃ abrūhayamāno appamāde agāravoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:78_17: Tathā āmisappaṭisanthāraṃ dhammappaṭisanthāranti imaṃ duvidhaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akarontoyeva paṭisanthāre agāravoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:79_1: Vivādamūlaniddese “sattharipi agāravo”tiādīnaṃ buddhe agāravādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:79_4: Ajjhattaṃ vāti attano santāne vā attano pakkhe vā;
atk-vin02a4:79_6: Bahiddhā vāti parasantāne vā parapakkhe vā.
atk-vin02a4:79_7: Tatra tumheti tasmiṃ ajjhattabahiddhābhede saparasantāne vā saparaparisāya vā.
atk-vin02a4:79_8: Pahānāya vāyameyyāthāti mettābhāvanādīhi nayehi pahānatthaṃ vāyameyyātha;
atk-vin02a4:79_9: mettābhāvanādinayena hi taṃ ajjhattampi bahiddhāpi pahīyati.
atk-vin02a4:81_2: atha kho aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya vivadantānaṃ kodhūpanāhādayo vivādamūlāni.
atk-vin02a4:81_3: Tathā vivadantā pana sīlavipattiādīsu aññataravipattiṃ āpajjitvā “asuko bhikkhu asukaṃ nāma vipattiṃ āpanno”ti vā,
atk-vin02a4:81_6: Evaṃ anuvadantānaṃ kodhūpanāhādayo anuvādamūlānīti ayamettha viseso.
atk-vin02a4:82_1: Sāraṇīyadhammaniddese mettacittena kataṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:82_2: Āvi ceva raho cāti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca.
atk-vin02a4:82_3: Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:82_4: Therānaṃ pana pādadhovanabījanavātadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:82_5: Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:82_6: Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyoti ayaṃ mettākāyakammasaṅkhāto dhammo saritabbo satijanako;
atk-vin02a4:82_11: Piyakaraṇoti taṃ puggalaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:82_12: Garukaraṇoti taṃ puggalaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ garuṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:82_14: Tehi saddhiṃ avivādāya samaggabhāvāya ekībhāvāya ca saṃvattati.
atk-vin02a4:83_0: Mettaṃ vacīkammantiādīsu devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:83_1: Vihāre asante pana taṃ paṭipucchantassa “kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero,
atk-vin02a4:83_3: kadā nu kho āgamissatī”ti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:83_4: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā pasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:83_6: appābādho”ti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:84_4: ettakaṃ vā asukassa ca asukassa ca dassāmi,
atk-vin02a4:84_7: Ayaṃ pana evaṃ akatvā ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya datvā gahitāvasesaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-vin02a4:84_9: sāraṇīyadhammapūrakena pana sabbesaṃ dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ. Gilāna-
atk-vin02a4:84_12: Na hi ete vicinitvā dentena puggalavibhāgo kato hoti,
atk-vin02a4:84_13: īdisānañhi kicchalābhattā viseso kātabboyevāti ayaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:85_0: Akhaṇḍānītiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:85_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:85_3: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:85_5: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:85_7: tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:85_8: Yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ abhinnāni sīlāni,
atk-vin02a4:85_9: tassa tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni nāma honti.
atk-vin02a4:85_13: Upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikānīti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a4:85_14: Sīlasāmaññagato viharatīti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi kalyāṇasīlehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo viharati.
atk-vin02a4:90_2: Sanidānaṃ saniddesanti nidānena ca niddesena ca saddhiṃ pucchissāmi.
atk-vin02a4:90_3: Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ kati āpattiyoti yāni tattha samukkaṭṭhāni uttamāni padāni vuttāni,
atk-vin02a4:90_4: tesaṃ samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ uttamapadānaṃ saṅkhepato kati āpattiyo hontīti.
atk-vin02a4:90_5: Yena yena hi padena yā yā āpatti paññattā,
atk-vin02a4:90_6: sā sā tassa tassa padassa āpattīti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:91_1: ko tehi attho”ti bhedapurekkhārānaṃ uposathakaraṇe thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:91_3: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ uposathakkhandhake tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:92_2: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ pavāraṇākkhandhakepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:93_2: sesesu dukkaṭanti evaṃ cammasaṃyuttepi tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:97_2: Samācāraṃ pucchissanti vutte vattakkhandhake ekā dukkaṭāpattiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:101_1: Āpattikarā dhammā jānitabbātiādimhi ekuttarikanaye āpattikarā dhammā nāma cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni.
atk-vin02a4:101_5: Āpatti jānitabbāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca vibhaṅge ca vuttā āpatti jānitabbā.
atk-vin02a4:101_6: Anāpattīti “anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassā”tiādinā nayena anāpatti jānitabbā.
atk-vin02a4:101_7: Lahukāti lahukena vinayakammena visujjhanato pañcavidhā āpatti.
atk-vin02a4:101_8: Garukāti garukena vinayakammena visujjhanato saṅghādisesā āpatti.
atk-vin02a4:101_9: Kenaci ākārena anāpattibhāvaṃ upanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato pārājikāpatti ca.
atk-vin02a4:102_0: Antarāyikāti sattapi āpattiyo sañcicca vītikkantā saggantarāyañceva mokkhantarāyañca karontīti antarāyikā.
atk-vin02a4:102_1: Ajānantena vītikkantā pana paṇṇattivajjāpatti neva saggantarāyaṃ na mokkhantarāyaṃ karotīti anantarāyikā.
atk-vin02a4:102_2: Antarāyikaṃ āpannassāpi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminito vuṭṭhāya suddhipattassa sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa ca avārito saggamokkhamaggoti.
atk-vin02a4:102_5: Kiriyato samuṭṭhitā nāma yaṃ karonto āpajjati pārājikāpatti viya.
atk-vin02a4:102_8: Kiriyākiriyatoti yaṃ karonto ca akaronto ca āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:103_7: Aparāpattīnaṃ antarāpatti nāma mānattacāre āpannā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:104_0: Desitā gaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā puna na āpajjissāmīti desitā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:104_1: Agaṇanūpagā nāma yā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā saussāheneva cittena aparisuddhena desitā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:104_4: Paññatti jānitabbātiādīsu navasu padesu paṭhamapārājikapucchāya vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:105_3: yā ca dhammikassa paṭissavassa asaccāpane āpatti,
atk-vin02a4:105_9: Adhiccāpattiko nāma yo kadāci karahaci āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:106_0: Codako nāma yo vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā paraṃ codeti.
atk-vin02a4:106_1: Yo pana evaṃ codito ayaṃ cuditako nāma.
atk-vin02a4:106_2: Pañcadasasu dhammesu appatiṭṭhahitvā abhūtena vatthunā codento adhammacodako nāma,
atk-vin02a4:106_5: Micchattaniyatehi vā sammattaniyatehi vā dhammehi samannāgato niyato,
atk-vin02a4:107_1: buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca abhabbāpattikā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:107_4: Ayañhi uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā dhammaparibhogaṃ vā āmisaparibhogaṃ vā na kopeti.
atk-vin02a4:107_14: Ṭhapanaṃ jānitabbanti “ekaṃ bhikkhave adhammikaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapana”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapanaṃ jānitabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:110_11: Paraparikkhārapaṭisaññuttā nāma saṅghikamañcapīṭhādīnaṃ ajjhokāse santharaṇaanāpucchāgamanādīsu āpajjitabbā āpatti.
atk-vin02a4:110_12: Sapuggalapaṭisaññuttā nāma “mudupiṭṭhikassa lambissa ūrunā aṅgajātaṃ pīḷentassā”tiādinā nayena vuttāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:111_0: “Saṅghakammaṃ vaggaṃ karissāmī”ti antosīmāya ekamante nisīdanto bhūmigato āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:111_4: Vehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdanto vehāsagato āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:111_5: Sace pana taṃ bhūmiyaṃ paññāpetvā nipajjeyya na āpajjeyya,
atk-vin02a4:111_8: Gamiyo gamiyavattaṃ apūretvā gacchanto nikkhamanto āpajjati nāma,
atk-vin02a4:111_10: Āgantuko āgantukavattaṃ apūretvā sachattupāhano pavisanto pavisanto āpajjati nāma,
atk-vin02a4:112_0: Ādiyanto āpajjati nāma bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyamānā;
atk-vin02a4:112_1: dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ anādiyitvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjanto pana anādiyanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_2: Mūgabbatādīni titthiyavattāni samādiyanto samādiyanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_3: Pārivāsikādayo pana tajjanīyādikammakatā vā attano vattaṃ asamādiyantā āpajjanti,
atk-vin02a4:112_4: te sandhāya vuttaṃ “atthāpatti na samādiyanto āpajjatī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:112_5: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbanto vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammacittakammādīni vā karonto karonto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_7: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadamāno dento āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_8: Saddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ cīvarādīni adento adento āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_9: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ gaṇhanto paṭiggaṇhanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:112_10: “Na bhikkhave ovādo na gahetabbo”ti vacanato ovādaṃ agaṇhanto na paṭiggaṇhanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:113_0: Nissaggiyavatthuṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanto paribhogena āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:113_1: Pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmayamānā aparibhogena āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:113_2: Sahagāraseyyaṃ rattiṃ āpajjati nāma, no divā,
atk-vin02a4:113_6: pavāretvā bhuñjanto na aruṇugge āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:114_0: Bhūtagāmañceva aṅgajātañca chindanto chindanto āpajjati nāma,
atk-vin02a4:114_1: kese vā nakhe vā na chindanto na chindanto āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:114_5: yo āgaccheyya āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imaṃ pana āpattiṃ na chādento āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:114_7: “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti imaṃ āpattiṃ na dhārento āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:115_0: “Attanā vā attānaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakaṃ karotī”ti ekasīmāyaṃ dvīsu saṅghesu nisinnesu ekasmiṃ pakkhe nisīditvā
atk-vin02a4:115_1: parapakkhassa laddhiṃ gaṇhanto yasmiṃ pakkhe nisinno tesaṃ attanāva attānaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:115_2: Yesaṃ santike nisinno tesaṃ gaṇapūrako hutvā kammaṃ kopeti,
atk-vin02a4:115_8: Satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhāti āpajjitabbato āpattiyo,
atk-vin02a4:115_9: rāsaṭṭhena khandhāti evaṃ dveyeva nāmāni hontīti nāmavasena dukaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:115_10: Kammena vā salākaggāhena vāti ettha uddeso ceva kammañca ekaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:115_11: vohāro ceva anussāvanā ca salākaggāho ca ekaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:116_2: Vatthuvipanno nāma paṇḍako tiracchānagato ubhatobyañjanako ca.
atk-vin02a4:116_3: Avasesā theyyasaṃvāsakādayo aṭṭha abhabbapuggalā karaṇadukkaṭakā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:116_5: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve katena attano kammena abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pattāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:116_7: No ca yācati nāma upasampadaṃ na yācati.
atk-vin02a4:116_8: Alajjissa ca bālassa cāti alajjī sacepi tepiṭako hoti,
atk-vin02a4:116_11: Bālassa ca lajjissa cāti ettha bālassa “tvaṃ nissayaṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇāyapi nissayo dātabbo,
atk-vin02a4:117_5: tattha tisso sikkhā asikkhato sikkhūpaghātikāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:117_6: Saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā dupparibhogaṃ bhuñjato bhogūpaghātikāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:117_8: Paññattaṃ nāma sakale vinayapiṭake kappiyākappiyavasena paññattaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:117_17: Kāyena vuṭṭhātīti tiṇavatthārakasamathe vināpi desanāya kāyeneva vuṭṭhāti;
atk-vin02a4:118_0: Anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti atherova samāno therehi vahitabbaṃ bījanagāhadhammajjhesanādibhāraṃ vahati;
atk-vin02a4:118_2: Āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahatīti thero therakiccaṃ na karoti,
atk-vin02a4:118_3: “anujānāmi bhikkhave therena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhāsituṃ,
atk-vin02a4:118_5: anujānāmi bhikkhave therādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādi sabbaṃ parihāpetīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:118_6: Na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyitvā karoti.
atk-vin02a4:118_7: Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyitvā karoti.
atk-vin02a4:118_8: Etesaṃ dvinnaṃ divā ca ratto ca āsavā vaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:121_1: Tikesu atthāpatti tiṭṭhante bhagavati āpajjatīti atthi āpatti,
atk-vin02a4:121_7: na vo mamaccayena evaṃ samudācaritabbaṃ, navakena, ānanda,
atk-vin02a4:121_8: bhikkhunā thero bhikkhū ‘bhante’ti vā ‘āyasmā’ti vā samudācaritabbo”ti vacanato theraṃ āvusovādena samudācaraṇapaccayā
atk-vin02a4:121_11: Imā dve āpattiyo ṭhapetvā avasesā dharantepi bhagavati āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:122_0: Pavāretvā anatirittaṃ bhuñjanto āpattiṃ kāle āpajjati no vikāle.
atk-vin02a4:122_1: Vikālabhojanāpattiṃ pana vikāle āpajjati no kāle.
atk-vin02a4:122_2: Avasesā kāle ceva āpajjati vikāle ca.
atk-vin02a4:122_6: “Dasavassomhi atirekadasavassomhī”ti bālo abyatto parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento dasavasso āpajjati no ūnadasavasso.
atk-vin02a4:122_7: “Ahaṃ paṇḍito byatto”ti navo vā majjhimo vā parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento ūnadasavasso āpajjati no dasavasso.
atk-vin02a4:122_8: Sesā dasavasso ceva āpajjati ūnadasavasso ca.
atk-vin02a4:122_9: “Pañcavassomhī”ti bālo abyatto anissāya vasanto pañcavasso āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:122_10: “Ahaṃ paṇḍito byatto”ti navako anissāya vasanto ūnapañcavasso āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:122_11: Sesaṃ pañcavasso ceva āpajjati ūnapañcavasso ca.
atk-vin02a4:122_13: mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desento evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacitto āpajjati, pārājika-
atk-vin02a4:122_27: taṃyeva majjhatto hutvā āpajjanto adukkhamasukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:123_0: Tayo paṭikkhepāti buddhassa bhagavato tayo paṭikkhepā.
atk-vin02a4:123_1: Catūsu paccayesu mahicchatā asantuṭṭhitā kilesasallekhanapaṭipattiyā agopāyanā,
atk-vin02a4:123_2: ime hi tayo dhammā buddhena bhagavatā paṭikkhittā.
atk-vin02a4:123_3: Appicchatādayo pana tayo buddhena bhagavatā anuññātā,
atk-vin02a4:124_0: “Dasavassomhī”ti parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento “pañcavassomhī”ti nissayaṃ agaṇhanto bālo āpajjati no paṇḍito,
atk-vin02a4:124_1: ūnadasavasso “byattomhī”ti bahussutattā parisaṃ upaṭṭhāpento ūnapañcavasso ca nissayaṃ agaṇhanto paṇḍito āpajjati no bālo;
atk-vin02a4:124_2: avasesaṃ paṇḍito ceva āpajjati bālo ca.
atk-vin02a4:124_3: Vassaṃ anupagacchanto kāḷe āpajjati no juṇhe;
atk-vin02a4:124_4: mahāpavāraṇāya appavārento juṇhe āpajjati no kāḷe;
atk-vin02a4:124_5: avasesaṃ kāḷe ceva āpajjati juṇhe ca.
atk-vin02a4:124_7: mahāpavāraṇāya pavāraṇā juṇhe kappati no kāḷe;
atk-vin02a4:124_8: sesaṃ anuññātakaṃ kāḷe ceva kappati juṇhe ca.
atk-vin02a4:125_0: Kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:125_1: Kurundiyaṃ pana “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:125_3: “Cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:125_4: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyesanto atirekaḍḍhamāse sese katvā nivāsento ca gimhe āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:125_5: Satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpento vasse āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:125_6: Pārisuddhiuposathaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ vā karonto saṅgho āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:125_8: Ekako suttuddesaṃ pārisuddhiuposathañca karonto puggalo āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:126_0: Saṅghuposatho ca saṅghapavāraṇā ca saṅghasseva kappati.
atk-vin02a4:126_1: Gaṇuposatho ca gaṇapavāraṇā ca gaṇasseva kappati.
atk-vin02a4:126_2: Adhiṭṭhānuposatho ca adhiṭṭhānapavāraṇā ca puggalasseva kappati.
atk-vin02a4:126_3: “Pārājikaṃ āpannomhī”tiādīni bhaṇanto vatthuṃ chādeti na āpattiṃ,
atk-vin02a4:126_4: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi”ntiādīni bhaṇanto āpattiṃ chādeti no vatthuṃ,
atk-vin02a4:126_5: yo neva vatthuṃ na āpattiṃ āroceti,
atk-vin02a4:127_3: Dvāraṃ pidahitvā antojantāghare ṭhitena parikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:127_5: Ubhayattha khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:127_6: Vatthapaṭicchādi sabbakappiyatāya paṭicchannena sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:127_8: nindaṃ vā paṭikkosaṃ vā na labhanti.
atk-vin02a4:127_12: dhammavinayopi vivaritvā vibhajitvā desiyamānova virocati no paṭicchanno.
atk-vin02a4:128_0: Aññena bhesajjena karaṇīyena aññaṃ viññāpento gilāno āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:128_1: na bhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento agilāno āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:128_2: avasesaṃ āpattiṃ gilāno ceva āpajjati agilāno ca.
atk-vin02a4:129_0: Anto āpajjati no bahīti anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappento anto āpajjati no bahi,
atk-vin02a4:129_1: bahi āpajjati no antoti saṅghikaṃ mañcādiṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā pakkamanto bahi āpajjati no anto,
atk-vin02a4:129_2: avasesaṃ pana anto ceva āpajjati bahi ca.
atk-vin02a4:129_3: Antosīmāyāti āgantuko āgantukavattaṃ adassetvā sachattupāhano vihāraṃ pavisanto upacārasīmaṃ okkantamattova āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:129_4: Bahisīmāyāti gamiko dārubhaṇḍapaṭisāmanādigamikavattaṃ apūretvā pakkamanto upacārasīmaṃ atikkantamattova āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:129_5: Avasesaṃ antosīmāya ceva āpajjati bahisīmāya ca.
atk-vin02a4:129_6: Sati vuḍḍhatare anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ bhāsanto saṅghamajjhe āpajjati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:129_9: Kāyaṃ acāletvā vācāya desentassa vācāya vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:129_10: Vacīsampayuttaṃ kāyakiriyaṃ katvā desentassa kāyena vācāya vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:130_1: tajjanīyakammādikatassa vattaṃ na pūrayato icchamāno saṅgho ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:130_2: Alajjī ca hoti bālo ca apakatatto cāti ettha bālo “ayaṃ dhammādhammaṃ na jānāti” apakatatto vā “āpattānāpattiṃ
atk-vin02a4:130_3: na jānātī”ti na ettāvatā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:130_4: bālabhāvamūlakaṃ pana apakatattabhāvamūlakañca āpattiṃ āpannassa kammaṃ kātabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:130_5: Adhisīle sīlavipanno nāma dve āpattikkhandhe āpanno;
atk-vin02a4:130_8: Tesaṃ āpattiṃ apassantānaṃ appaṭikarontānaṃ diṭṭhiñca anissajjantānaṃyeva kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:131_0: Kāyiko davo nāma pāsakādīhi jūtakīḷanādibhedo anācāro;
atk-vin02a4:131_2: kāyikavācasiko nāma naccanagāyanādibhedo dvīhipi dvārehi anācāro.
atk-vin02a4:131_6: Kāyikena upaghātikenāti kāyadvāre paññattassa sikkhāpadassa asikkhanena,
atk-vin02a4:131_9: tasmā tassa taṃ asikkhanaṃ “kāyikaṃ upaghātika”nti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:131_11: Kāyikena micchājīvenāti jaṅghapesanikādinā vā gaṇḍaphālanādinā vā vejjakammena;
atk-vin02a4:132_0: Alaṃ bhikkhu mā bhaṇḍananti alaṃ bhikkhu mā bhaṇḍanaṃ kari,
atk-vin02a4:132_4: vadatopi hi tādisassa vacanaṃ na sotabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-vin02a4:132_5: Na kismiñci paccekaṭṭhāneti kismiñci bījanaggāhādike ekasmimpi jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne na ṭhapetabboti attho.
atk-vin02a4:132_7: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kārentassa.
atk-vin02a4:132_8: Nālaṃ okāsakammaṃ kātunti “kiṃ tvaṃ karissasī”ti okāso na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:133_0: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno vinayoti yaṃ so jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:133_3: Anuyogo na dātabboti “idaṃ kappatī”ti pucchantassa pucchāya okāso na dātabbo,
atk-vin02a4:133_5: Iti so neva pucchitabbo nāssa pucchā sotabbāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:133_6: Vinayo na sākacchātabboti vinayapañho na sākacchitabbo,
atk-vin02a4:134_3: “Idamappahāyā”ti vacanato pana taṃ brahmacāripaṭiññātaṃ pahāya khīṇāsavaṃ “musā mayā bhaṇitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:134_4: khamatha me”ti khamāpetvā “natthi kāmesu doso”ti laddhiṃ vijahitvā gativisodhanaṃ kareyya.
atk-vin02a4:134_8: Duṭṭhu caritāni virūpāni vā caritāni duccaritāni.
atk-vin02a4:134_9: Suṭṭhu caritāni sundarāni vā caritāni sucaritāni.
atk-vin02a4:137_1: Catukkesu sakavācāya āpajjati paravācāya vuṭṭhātīti vacīdvārikaṃ padasodhammādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā
atk-vin02a4:137_3: Paravācāya āpajjati sakavācāya vuṭṭhātīti pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge parassa kammavācāya āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:137_5: Sakavācāya āpajjati sakavācāya vuṭṭhātīti vacīdvārikaṃ padasodhammādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ sakavācāya āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:137_7: Paravācāya āpajjati paravācāya vuṭṭhātīti yāvatatiyakaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ parassa kammavācāya āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:137_17: Saṅghikamañcassa attano paccattharaṇena anattharato kāyasamphusane lomagaṇanāya āpajjitabbāpattiṃ sahagāraseyyāpattiñca pasutto āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:137_18: pabujjhitvā pana āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā desento paṭibuddho vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:137_19: Jagganto āpajjitvā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathaṭṭhāne sayanto paṭibuddho āpajjati pasutto vuṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:138_6: ayaṃ desanāpaccayā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanto pācittiyādīsu aññataraṃ deseti,
atk-vin02a4:138_8: Taṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanto pācittiyādito vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:138_10: Iti ekassa puggalassa ekameva payogaṃ sandhāya “āpattiṃ āpajjanto desetī”ti idaṃ catukkaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:139_0: Kammacatukke pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggāpattiṃ kammena āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:140_3: Sace pana so pattacīvaranavakammabhesajjānaṃ atthāya āhaṭo hoti,
atk-vin02a4:141_0: Sammukhācatukke pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggāpattiṃ saṅghassa sammukhā āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:141_1: vuṭṭhānakāle pana saṅghena kiccaṃ natthīti parammukhā vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:142_0: Liṅgapātubhāvenāti sayitasseva bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā liṅgaparivatte jāte sahagāraseyyāpatti hoti idameva taṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:142_3: so saha liṅgapaṭilābhena paṭhamaṃ uppannavasena seṭṭhabhāvena ca purimaṃ purisaliṅgaṃ jahati,
atk-vin02a4:142_6: bhikkhūti vā purisoti vā evaṃ pavattā paṇṇattiyo nirujjhanti,
atk-vin02a4:142_7: yāni bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni chacattālīsa sikkhāpadāni tehi anāpattiyeva hoti.
atk-vin02a4:142_8: Dutiyacatukke pana yassā bhikkhuniyā liṅgaṃ parivattati,
atk-vin02a4:142_9: sā pacchāsamuppattiyā vā hīnabhāvena vā pacchimanti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ itthiliṅgaṃ jahati,
atk-vin02a4:142_10: vuttappakārena purimanti saṅkhyaṃ gate purisaliṅge patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:142_12: bhikkhunīti vā itthīti vā evaṃ pavattā paṇṇattiyopi nirujjhanti,
atk-vin02a4:142_13: yāni bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni sataṃ tiṃsañca sikkhāpadāni,
atk-vin02a4:143_1: te hi bhagavatā anuppanne vatthumhi sayaṃ ukkaṃsitvā ukkhipitvā ṭhapitattā “sāmukkaṃsā”ti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a4:143_5: Cattāri mahāvikaṭāni kālodissattā yathāvutte kāle vaṭṭanti.
atk-vin02a4:143_6: Upāsako sīlavāti pañca vā dasa vā sīlāni gopayamāno.
atk-vin02a4:144_0: Āgantukādicatukke sachattupāhano sasīsaṃ pāruto vihāraṃ pavisanto tattha vicaranto ca āgantukova āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:144_7: Gamiyacatukkepi gamiyavattaṃ apūretvā gacchanto gamiko āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:144_13: Vatthunānattatādicatukke catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññamaññaṃ vatthunānattatāva hoti,naāpattinānattatā.
atk-vin02a4:144_16: Bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca aññamaññaṃ kāyasaṃsagge bhikkhussa saṅghādiseso bhikkhuniyā pārājikanti evaṃ āpattinānattatāva hoti,
atk-vin02a4:144_20: bhikkhussa dukkaṭa”nti evamādināpettha nayena yojanā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:144_21: Catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ terasahi saṅghādisesehi saddhiṃ vatthunānattatā ceva āpattinānattatā ca.
atk-vin02a4:144_23: Ādito paṭṭhāya cattāri pārājikāni ekato āpajjantānaṃ bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ neva vatthunānattatā no āpattinānattatā.
atk-vin02a4:144_24: Visuṃ āpajjantesupi sesā sādhāraṇāpattiyo āpajjantesupi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:145_0: Vatthusabhāgādicatukke bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsagge vatthusabhāgatā,
atk-vin02a4:145_5: Bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca catūsu pārājikesu vatthusabhāgatā ceva āpattisabhāgatā ca.
atk-vin02a4:146_0: Upajjhāyacatukke saddhivihārikassa upajjhāyena kattabbavattassa akaraṇe āpattiṃ upajjhāyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:146_1: no saddhivihāriko upajjhāyassa kattabbavattaṃ akaronto saddhivihāriko āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:147_0: Ādiyantacatukke pādaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā sahatthā ādiyanto garukaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:147_1: ūnakapādaṃ gaṇhāhīti āṇattiyā aññaṃ payojento lahukaṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:148_0: Abhivādanārahacatukke bhikkhunīnaṃ tāva bhattagge navamabhikkhunito paṭṭhāya upajjhāyāpi abhivādanārahā no paccuṭṭhānārahā.
atk-vin02a4:148_1: Avisesena ca vippakatabhojanassa bhikkhussa yo koci vuḍḍhataro.
atk-vin02a4:148_2: Saṭṭhivassassāpi pārivāsikassa samīpagato tadahupasampannopi paccuṭṭhānāraho no abhivādanāraho.
atk-vin02a4:148_3: Appaṭikkhittesu ṭhānesu vuḍḍho navakassa abhivādanāraho ceva paccuṭṭhānāraho ca.
atk-vin02a4:148_4: Navako pana vuḍḍhassa neva abhivādanāraho na paccuṭṭhānāraho.
atk-vin02a4:149_0: Kālacatukke pavāretvā bhuñjanto kāle āpajjati no vikāle,
atk-vin02a4:149_2: sesaṃ kāle ceva āpajjati vikāle ca,
atk-vin02a4:149_4: Paṭiggahitacatukke purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitāmisaṃ kāle kappati no vikāle.
atk-vin02a4:149_7: Sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ kāle ceva kappati vikāle ca.
atk-vin02a4:149_8: Attano attano kālātītaṃ yāvakālikādittayaṃ akappiyamaṃsaṃ uggahitakamappaṭiggahitakañca neva kāle kappati no vikāle.
atk-vin02a4:150_0: Paccantimacatukke samudde sīmaṃ bandhanto paccantimesu janapadesu āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:150_2: pañcavaggena gaṇena upasampādento guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṃ dhuvanahānaṃ cammattharaṇāni ca majjhimesu janapadesu āpajjati no paccantimesu.
atk-vin02a4:150_3: Imāni cattāri “idha na kappantī”ti vadantopi paccantimesu āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:150_7: Dutiyacatukke pañcavaggena gaṇena upasampadādi catubbidhampi vatthu paccantimesu janapadesu kappati.
atk-vin02a4:150_8: “Idaṃ kappatī”ti dīpetumpi tattheva kappati no majjhimesu.
atk-vin02a4:150_9: “Idaṃ na kappatī”ti dīpetuṃ pana majjhimesu janapadesu kappati no paccantimesu.
atk-vin02a4:150_10: Sesaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave pañca loṇānī”tiādi anuññātakaṃ ubhayattha kappati.
atk-vin02a4:151_0: Antoādicatukke anupakhajja seyyādiṃ anto āpajjati no bahi,
atk-vin02a4:151_1: ajjhokāse saṅghikamañcādīni nikkhipitvā pakkamanto bahi āpajjati no anto,
atk-vin02a4:151_4: Antosīmādicatukke āgantuko vattaṃ apūrento antosīmāya āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:151_5: gamiyo bahisīmāya musāvādādiṃ antosīmāya ca bahisīmāya ca āpajjati,asādhāraṇaṃ na katthaci.
atk-vin02a4:151_6: Gāmacatukke antaragharapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sekhiyapaññattiṃ gāme āpajjati no araññe.
atk-vin02a4:151_7: Bhikkhunī aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpayamānā araññe āpajjati no gāme.
atk-vin02a4:151_8: Musāvādādiṃ gāme ceva āpajjati araññe ca,
atk-vin02a4:152_0: Cattāro pubbakiccāti “sammajjanī padīpo ca udakaṃ āsanena cā”ti idaṃ catubbidhaṃ pubbakaraṇanti vuccatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:152_1: “Chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo”ti ime pana “cattāro pubbakiccā”ti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:152_2: Cattāro pattakallāti uposatho yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti,
atk-vin02a4:152_4: vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti,
atk-vin02a4:152_6: Cattāri anaññapācittiyānīti “etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiya”nti evaṃ vuttāni anupakhajjaseyyākappanasikkhāpadaṃ
atk-vin02a4:152_10: Catasso bhikkhusammutiyoti “ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
atk-vin02a4:152_11: aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
atk-vin02a4:152_12: tato ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
atk-vin02a4:152_13: duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā”ti evaṃ āgatā terasahi sammutīhi muttā sammutiyo.
atk-vin02a4:152_14: Gilānacatukke aññabhesajjena karaṇīyena lolatāya aññaṃ viññāpento gilāno āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:155_1: Pañcakesu pañca puggalā niyatāti ānantariyānamevetaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:155_2: Pañca chedanakā āpattiyo nāma pamāṇātikkante mañcapīṭhe nisīdanakaṇḍuppaṭicchādivassikasāṭikāsu sugatacīvare ca veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:155_8: Anāmantacāroti “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti imassa āpucchitvā cārassa abhāvo.
atk-vin02a4:155_9: Anadhiṭṭhānanti “gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā”ti vuttaṃ samayaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā bhojanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma;
atk-vin02a4:155_11: Avikappanā nāma yā paramparabhojane vikappanā vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:155_13: Imāni hi pañca piṇḍapātikassa dhutaṅgeneva paṭikkhittāni.
atk-vin02a4:155_19: Na hi etesu sandissamāno ayasato vā garahato vā muccati.
atk-vin02a4:155_23: Ābhisekikanti nahānaṭṭhāne vā rañño abhisekaṭṭhāne vā chaḍḍitacīvaraṃ.
atk-vin02a4:156_0: Pañcāpattiyo kāyato samuṭṭhantīti paṭhamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena pañca āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:156_1: “bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saññācikāya kuṭiṃ karotī”ti evaṃ antarapeyyāle vuttāpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:156_2: Pañca āpattiyo kāyato ca vācato cāti tatiyena āpattisamuṭṭhānena pañca āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:156_3: “bhikkhu kappiyasaññī saṃvidahitvā kuṭiṃ karotī”ti evaṃ tattheva vuttā āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:157_0: Pañca kammānīti tajjanīyaniyassapabbājanīyapaṭisāraṇīyāni cattāri ukkhepanīyañca tividhampi ekanti pañca.
atk-vin02a4:157_1: Yāvatatiyake pañcāti ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantiyā pārājikaṃ thullaccayaṃ dukkaṭanti tisso,
atk-vin02a4:157_11: Cittakammadānanti āvāsaṃ kāretvā tattha cittakammaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:157_13: Imāni hi pañca kiñcāpi lokassa puññasammatāni,
atk-vin02a4:157_15: Uppannaṃ paṭibhānanti ettha paṭibhānanti kathetukamyatā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:157_17: upāyena pana kāraṇena anurūpāhi paccavekkhanāanusāsanādīhi sakkā paṭivinodetunti attho.
atk-vin02a4:158_1: kaṭaandhakāravāsī phussadevatthero kira cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā sinduvārakusumasanthatamiva
atk-vin02a4:158_2: samavippakiṇṇavālikaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokento buddhārammaṇaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a4:158_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pabbatapāde nibbattakāḷamakkaṭo viya hutvā cetiyaṅgaṇe gomayaṃ vippakiranto gato.
atk-vin02a4:158_6: Dutiyadivasepi jaraggavo hutvā tādisameva vippakāraṃ akāsi.
atk-vin02a4:158_7: Tatiyadivase vaṅkapādaṃ manussattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā pādena parikasanto agamāsi.
atk-vin02a4:158_8: Thero “evarūpo bībhacchapuriso samantā yojanappamāṇesu gocaragāmesu natthi,
atk-vin02a4:158_9: siyā nu kho māro”ti cintetvā “mārosi tva”nti āha. “Āma, bhante, māromhi,
atk-vin02a4:158_14: iṅgha tāva buddhassa bhagavato attabhāvasadisaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimmināhī”ti?
atk-vin02a4:158_17: apica kho pana taṃsarikkhakaṃ patirūpakaṃ nimminissāmī”ti sakabhāvaṃ vijahitvā buddharūpasadisena attabhāvena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a4:158_18: Thero māraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ tāva sarāgadosamoho evaṃ sobhati,
atk-vin02a4:158_19: kathaṃ nu kho bhagavā na sobhati sabbaso vītarāgadosamoho”ti buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-vin02a4:158_24: Lokantaravihārepi datto nāma daharabhikkhu cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā olokento odātakasiṇaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-vin02a4:159_1: tisso nāma daharabhikkhu jambukolacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā saṅkārachaḍḍaniṃ hatthena gahetvāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-vin02a4:159_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tissadattatthero nāma nāvāto oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokento bhāvitacittena sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti ñatvā pañhāsahassaṃ pucchi,
atk-vin02a4:159_4: Aññatarasmimpi vihāre thero cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā vattaṃ paricchindi.
atk-vin02a4:159_5: Yonakavisayato cetiyavandakā cattāro therā āgantvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ disvā anto appavisitvā dvāreyeva ṭhatvā eko thero aṭṭha kappe anussari,
atk-vin02a4:160_0: Devatā attamanā hontīti ettha idaṃ vatthu –
atk-vin02a4:160_1: ekasmiṃ kira vihāre eko bhikkhu cetiyaṅgaṇañca bodhiyaṅgaṇañca sammajjitvā nahāyituṃ gato.
atk-vin02a4:160_2: Devatā “imassa vihārassa katakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vattaṃ pūretvā sammaṭṭhapubbo bhikkhu natthī”ti pasannacittā pupphahatthā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a4:160_5: imassa vihārassa katakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vattaṃ pūretvā sammaṭṭhapubbo bhikkhu natthīti tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-vin02a4:160_6: vatte pasīditvā pupphahatthā ṭhitāmhā”ti devatā āhaṃsu.
atk-vin02a4:161_1: ekaṃ kira amaccaputtaṃ abhayattherañca ārabbha ayaṃ kathā udapādi “kiṃ nu kho amaccaputto pāsādiko,
atk-vin02a4:161_2: abhayattheroti ubhopi ne ekasmiṃ ṭhāne olokessāmā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:161_3: Ñātakā amaccaputtaṃ alaṅkaritvā mahācetiyaṃ vandāpessāmāti agamaṃsu.
atk-vin02a4:161_4: Theramātāpi pāsādikaṃ cīvaraṃ kāretvā puttassa pahiṇi,
atk-vin02a4:161_5: “putto me kese chindāpetvā imaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mahācetiyaṃ vandatū”ti.
atk-vin02a4:161_7: abhayatthero bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruhitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe tena saddhiṃ samāgantvā āha –
atk-vin02a4:161_9: mahallakattherassa sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mayā saddhiṃ yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāsī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:161_10: Atītattabhāve kira abhayatthero mahallakatthero nāma hutvā gocaragāme cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajji,
atk-vin02a4:161_11: amaccaputto mahāupāsako hutvā sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ gahetvā chaḍḍesi.
atk-vin02a4:162_0: Satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti idaṃ sammajjanavattaṃ nāma buddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:162_1: tasmā taṃ karontena satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:162_3: āyasmā kira sāriputto himavantaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ pabbhāre asammajjitvāva nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-vin02a4:162_4: Bhagavā āvajjanto therassa asammajjitvā nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā ākāsena gantvā therassa purato asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne pādāni dassetvā paccāgañchi.
atk-vin02a4:162_5: Thero samāpattito vuṭṭhito bhagavato pādāni disvā balavahirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a4:162_7: saṅghamajjhe dāni codanaṃ kāressāmī”ti dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-vin02a4:162_9: sāriputtā”ti vatvā “na patirūpaṃ dāni te mayhaṃ anantare ṭhāne ṭhatvā vicarantassa asammajjitvā nisīditu”nti āha.
atk-vin02a4:162_10: Tato paṭṭhāya thero gaṇṭhikapaṭimuñcanaṭṭhānepi tiṭṭhanto pādena kacavaraṃ viyūhitvāva tiṭṭhati.
atk-vin02a4:163_0: Attano bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhātīti “imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ettakaṃ suttaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-vin02a4:163_2: ettakaṃ suttañca vinicchayañca vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ attano bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a4:163_8: ettakaṃ na gayhūpaga”nti evaṃ anuggaṇhanto pana parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:163_9: Āpattiṃ na jānātīti pārājikaṃ vā saṅghādisesaṃ vāti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:163_10: Mūlanti dve āpattiyā mūlāni kāyo ca vācā ca,
atk-vin02a4:163_14: Pārājikādīnaṃ vatthuṃ na jānātītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:163_17: ayaṃ vuṭṭhānenāti evaṃ āpattinirodhaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:163_18: Satta samathe ajānanto pana āpattinirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_11: kiccādhikaraṇaṃ cattāri saṅghakiccānīti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ na jānātīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:164_12: Adhikaraṇanirodhaṃ na jānātīti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena mūlāmūlaṃ gantvā vinicchayasamathaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti;
atk-vin02a4:164_15: idaṃ tīhi idaṃ ekena samathena sammatī”ti evaṃ satta samathe ajānanto pana adhikaraṇanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ na jānāti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:164_17: idaṃ saṅghādisesassā”ti evaṃ sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_18: Nidānanti “sattannaṃ nidānānaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ettha paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:164_20: Paññattiṃ na jānātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade paṭhamapaññattiṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_24: Ñattiṃ na jānātīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_25: Ñattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānātīti ñattikiccaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:164_26: osāraṇādīsu navasu ṭhānesu ñattikammaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:164_27: ñattidutiyañatticatutthakammesu ñattiyā kammappatto hutvā tiṭṭhatīti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:164_28: Na pubbakusalo hoti na aparakusaloti pubbe kathetabbañca pacchā kathetabbañca na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:164_31: Akālaññū ca hotīti kālaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:165_0: Mandattā momūhattāti kevalaṃ aññāṇena momūhabhāvena dhutaṅge ānisaṃsaṃ ajānitvā.
atk-vin02a4:165_3: Idamatthitanti imāya kalyāṇāya paṭipattiyā attho etassāti idamatthi,
atk-vin02a4:165_5: taṃ idamatthitaṃyeva nissāya na aññaṃ kiñci lokāmisanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:166_0: Uposathaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ uposathaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:166_1: Uposathakammanti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ catubbidhaṃ uposathakammaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:166_3: Pātimokkhuddesanti sabbampi navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:167_3: Ativelanti velaṃ atikkamma bahutaraṃ kālaṃ kulesu appaṃ vihāreti attho.
atk-vin02a4:170_6: mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”,
atk-vin02a4:170_7: “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabboti ayaṃ tattha sāmīci”,
atk-vin02a4:170_12: “yassa bhavissati so harissatīti ayaṃ tattha sāmīcī”ti imā bhikkhupātimokkheyeva cha sāmīciyo.
atk-vin02a4:170_13: Cha chedanakāti pañcake vuttā pañca bhikkhunīnaṃ udakasāṭikāya saddhiṃ cha.
atk-vin02a4:170_14: Chahākārehīti alajjitā aññāṇatā kukkuccapakatatā akappiye kappiyasaññitā kappiye akappiyasaññitā satisammosāti.
atk-vin02a4:170_17: Cha ānisaṃsā vinayadhareti pañcake vuttā pañca tassādheyyo uposathoti iminā saddhiṃ cha.
atk-vin02a4:171_1: māsaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_2: santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_4: navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ chabbassaparamatā dhāretabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_8: chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:171_15: tato ekaṃ apanetvā sesesu ekekaṃ pakkhipitvātiādinā nayena aññānipi chakkāni kātabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:172_0: Cha āpattiyoti tīṇi chakkāni antarapeyyāle vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:172_4: āpattiyā adassane ca appaṭikamme ca vuttadvayampi ekaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:175_2: satta sāmīciyoti pubbe vuttesu chasu “sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā,
atk-vin02a4:175_4: ayaṃ tattha sāmīcī”ti imaṃ pakkhipitvā satta veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:175_5: Satta adhammikā paṭiññātakaraṇāti “bhikkhu pārājikaṃ ajjhāpanno hoti,
atk-vin02a4:175_10: Sattannaṃ anāpatti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantunti vassūpanāyikakkhandhake vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:175_11: Sattānisaṃsā vinayadhareti “tassādheyyo uposatho pavāraṇā”ti imehi saddhiṃ pañcake vuttā pañca satta honti.
atk-vin02a4:175_12: Satta paramānīti chakke vuttāniyeva sattakavasena yojetabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:176_2: bhikkhussa hoti āpatti paṭikātabbāti imāni tīṇi sattakāni,
atk-vin02a4:176_10: santo vā dhammā sundarā uttamāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:179_2: aṭṭhānisaṃseti “na mayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_4: na mayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ pavāressāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_10: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ karissāma,
atk-vin02a4:179_11: vinā iminā bhikkhunā karissāmā”ti evaṃ kosambakakkhandhake vutte ānisaṃse.
atk-vin02a4:180_1: bhikkhunīnaṃ sattarasake bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā cattāroti aṭṭha.
atk-vin02a4:180_2: Aṭṭhahākārehi kulāni dūsetīti kulāni dūseti pupphena vā phalena vā cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā dantakaṭṭhena
atk-vin02a4:180_3: vā veḷuyā vā vejjikāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vāti imehi aṭṭhahi.
atk-vin02a4:180_6: Aṭṭhahi asaddhammehīti lābhena alābhena yasena ayasena sakkārena asakkārena pāpicchatāya pāpamittatāya.
atk-vin02a4:180_13: Aṭṭhaṅgiko musāvādoti “vinidhāya sañña”nti iminā saddhiṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi sattahīti aṭṭhahi aṅgehi aṭṭhaṅgiko.
atk-vin02a4:183_0: Musā na bhāse na ca majjapo siyā;
atk-vin02a4:190_3: bhikkhu sotā ca hoti sāvetā cā”tiādinā nayena saṅghabhedake vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:190_5: Anatirittā ca atirittā ca pavāraṇāsikkhāpade niddiṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a4:190_9: Aṭṭhānisaṃsā vinayadhareti pañcake vuttesu pañcasu “tassādheyyo uposatho, pavāraṇā,
atk-vin02a4:190_10: saṅghakamma”nti ime tayo pakkhipitvā aṭṭha veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:190_11: Aṭṭha paramānīti pubbe vuttaparamāneva aṭṭhakavasena yojetvā veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:190_12: Aṭṭhasu dhammesu sammā vattitabbanti “na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposatho ṭhapetabbo,
atk-vin02a4:190_13: na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā”tiādinā nayena samathakkhandhake niddiṭṭhesu aṭṭhasu.
atk-vin02a4:193_4: taṃ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṃ paṭivinetī”tiādīni nava.
atk-vin02a4:193_5: Nava vinītavatthūnīti navahi āghātavatthūhi ārati virati paṭivirati setughāto.
atk-vin02a4:193_7: atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:193_8: Nava paramānīti pubbe vuttaparamāneva navakavasena yojetvā veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:193_9: Nava taṇhāmūlakā nāma taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā,
atk-vin02a4:193_19: Nava cīvarānīti ticīvaranti vā vassikasāṭikāti vātiādinā nayena vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:193_20: Na vikappetabbānīti adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:193_21: Nava adhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
atk-vin02a4:193_22: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
atk-vin02a4:193_23: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetīti evaṃ vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:194_0: Nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā ca.
atk-vin02a4:194_1: Tīṇi dhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghasseva deti,
atk-vin02a4:194_3: puggalassa ninnaṃ puggalasseva detīti imāni tīṇi.
atk-vin02a4:194_4: Paṭiggahapaṭibhogāpi tesaṃyeva paṭiggahā ca paribhogā ca.
atk-vin02a4:194_7: adhammavādisaṅghoti evaṃ tīṇi tikāni samathakkhandhake niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:194_8: Dhammikā saññattiyopi dhammavādī puggalotiādinā nayena tattheva niddiṭṭhā.
atk-vin02a4:194_9: Adhammakamme dve navakāni ovādavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpadaniddese pācittiyavasena vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:194_10: Dhammakamme dve navakāni tattheva dukkaṭavasena vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:197_2: dasa āghātavatthūnīti navakesu vuttāni nava “aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto jāyatī”ti iminā saddhiṃ dasa honti.
atk-vin02a4:197_3: Āghātapaṭivinayāpi tattha vuttā nava “aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto jāyati,
atk-vin02a4:197_4: taṃ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṃ paṭivinetī”ti iminā saddhiṃ dasa veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:197_5: Dasa vinītavatthūnīti dasahi āghātavatthūhi viratisaṅkhātāni dasa.
atk-vin02a4:197_8: “sassato loko”tiādinā vasena pana antaggāhikā diṭṭhi veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:198_0: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu ubbāhikāya sammannitabboti “sīlavā hotī”tiādinā nayena samathakkhandhake vuttehi dasahi.
atk-vin02a4:198_2: Dasa dānavatthūnīti annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālā gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ seyyāvasathaṃ padīpeyyaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:198_14: Dasa cīvaradhāraṇāti “sabbanīlakāni cīvarāni dhārentī”ti vuttavasena dasāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:198_15: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “navasu kappiyacīvaresu udakasāṭikaṃ vā saṅkaccikaṃ vā pakkhipitvā dasā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:199_13: Yāguānisaṃsā ca akappiyamaṃsāni ca bhesajjakkhandhake niddiṭṭhāni.
atk-vin02a4:202_6: Ekādasa pattāti tambalohamayena vā dārumayena vā saddhiṃ dasa ratanamayā.
atk-vin02a4:202_21: Na vikappetabbānīti etāneva adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya na vikappetabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:202_22: Gaṇṭhikā ca vidhā ca suttamayena saddhiṃ ekādasa honti,
atk-vin02a4:202_30: Ekādasa paramāni pubbe vuttesu cuddasasu ekādasakavasena yojetvā veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:202_31: Ekādasa varānīti mahāpajāpatiyā yācitavarena saddhiṃ pubbe vuttāni dasa.
atk-vin02a4:202_32: Ekādasa sīmādosāti “atikhuddakaṃ sīmaṃ sammannantī”tiādinā nayena kammavagge āgamissanti.
atk-vin02a4:203_3: sabrahmacārīnaṃ aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ so ekādasannaṃ byasanānaṃ aññataraṃ byasanaṃ na nigaccheyya.
atk-vin02a4:203_15: kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:204_0: Āsevitāyāti ādito paṭṭhāya sevitāya. Bhāvitāyāti nipphāditāya vaḍḍhitāya
atk-vin02a4:205_8: sabbadisāsu citāya ācitāya bhāvitāya abhivaḍḍhitāyāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:205_11: Na pāpakaṃ supinanti pāpakameva na passati,
atk-vin02a4:205_13: Devatā rakkhantīti ārakkhadevatā dhammikaṃ rakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpenti.
atk-vin02a4:205_14: Tuvaṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyatīti khippaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati.
atk-vin02a4:205_15: Uttari appaṭivijjhantoti mettājhānato uttariṃ arahattaṃ asacchikaronto sekho vā puthujjano vā hutvā kālaṃ karonto brahmalokūpago hoti.
atk-vin02a4:209_1: “Uposathakammassa ko ādī”tiādīnaṃ pucchānaṃ vissajjane sāmaggī ādīti “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti sīmaṃ sodhetvā
atk-vin02a4:209_3: Kiriyā majjheti pubbakiccaṃ katvā pātimokkhaosāraṇakiriyā majjhe.
atk-vin02a4:209_4: Niṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānanti “tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabba”nti idaṃ pātimokkhaniṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:209_5: Pavāraṇākammassa sāmaggī ādīti “pavāraṇaṃ karissāmā”ti sīmaṃ sodhetvā chandapavāraṇaṃ āharitvā sannipatitānaṃ kāyasāmaggī ādi.
atk-vin02a4:209_6: Kiriyā majjheti pavāraṇāñatti ca pavāraṇākathā ca majjhe,
atk-vin02a4:209_8: Tajjanīyakammādīsu vatthu nāma yena vatthunā kammāraho hoti,
atk-vin02a4:209_12: Kammavācā pariyosānanti “kataṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:209_15: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti evaṃ tassā tassā kammavācāya avasānavacanaṃ pariyosānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:212_2: dasa atthavasetiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyameva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:212_3: Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu taṃ saṅghaphāsūtiādīsu uparimaṃ uparimaṃ padaṃ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa padassa attho.
atk-vin02a4:213_0: Atthasataṃ dhammasatantiādimhi pana yadetaṃ dasasu padesu ekekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya padasataṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:213_1: Tattha pacchimassa pacchimassa padassa vasena atthasataṃ purimassa purimassa vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:213_2: Atha vā ye dasa atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:213_3: ye pubbe paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ “tattha saṅghasuṭṭhutā nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo ‘suṭṭhu devā’ti
atk-vin02a4:213_6: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti,
atk-vin02a4:213_7: tasmā saṅghassa ‘suṭṭhu bhante’ti mama vacanasampaṭicchanatthaṃ paññapessāmi asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ
atk-vin02a4:213_8: sampaṭicchane ca ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā na balakkārena abhibhavitvāti etamatthaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-vin02a4:213_10: tesaṃ idha dasakkhattuṃ āgatattā atthasataṃ tadatthajotakānañca padānaṃ vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:213_12: dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni,
atk-vin02a4:213_15: dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni ca veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:216_0: Iti hi yaṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttanti.
atk-vin02a4:221_1: Ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe cīvaraṃ katvā;
atk-vin02a4:221_5: Kissa tvaṃ idha māgatoti kena kāraṇena kimatthaṃ patthayamāno tvaṃ idha āgato.
atk-vin02a4:221_10: Iti āyasmā upāli bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “dvīsu vinayesū”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ pucchi.
atk-vin02a4:221_11: Athassa bhagavā “bhaddako te ummaṅgo”tiādīni vatvā taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-vin02a4:221_13: Iti ime sabbapañhe buddhakāle upālitthero pucchi.
atk-vin02a4:222_0: Tattha bhaddako te ummaṅgoti bhaddakā te pañhā;
atk-vin02a4:222_1: pañhā hi avijjandhakārato ummujjitvā ṭhitattā “ummaṅgo”ti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:222_6: “tagghā”ti hi iminā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā akkhissanti āha.
atk-vin02a4:222_8: sasitthaka”nti imāni tīṇiyeva sikkhāpadāni bhaggesu paññattāni.
atk-vin02a4:224_1: Yaṃ taṃ pucchimhāti yaṃ tvaṃ apucchimhā.
atk-vin02a4:224_4: Taṃ taṃ byākatanti yaṃ yaṃ puṭṭhaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:225_0: Ye duṭṭhullā sā sīlavipattīti ettha kiñcāpi sīlavipatti nāma pañhe natthi,
atk-vin02a4:225_2: Catūsu hi vipattīsu duṭṭhullaṃ ekāya vipattiyā saṅgahitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:225_4: Tasmā “ye duṭṭhullā sā sīlavipattī”ti vatvā tameva vitthārato dassetuṃ “pārājikaṃ saṅghādiseso sīlavipattīti vuccatī”ti āha.
atk-vin02a4:226_0: Idāni tissannaṃ vipattīnaṃ vasena aduṭṭhullaṃ dassetuṃ “thullaccaya”ntiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:226_2: akkosati hasādhippāyoti idaṃ dubbhāsitassa vatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:227_0: Abbhācikkhantīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti vadantā abbhācikkhanti.
atk-vin02a4:228_0: Ayaṃ sā ājīvavipattisammatāti ayaṃ chahi sikkhāpadehi saṅgahitā ājīvavipatti nāma catutthā vipatti sammatāti
atk-vin02a4:231_1: Yasmā pana “ye ca yāvatatiyakā”ti ayaṃ pañho “ekādasa yāvatatiyakā”ti evaṃ saṅkhāvasena vissajjito,
atk-vin02a4:231_2: tasmā saṅkhānusandhivaseneva “kati chedanakānī”tiādike aññe antarāpañhe pucchi.
atk-vin02a4:231_8: Yaṃ panetaṃ apubbaṃ tattha ekaṃ bhedanakanti sūcigharaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:231_14: jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya,
atk-vin02a4:231_15: jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā,
atk-vin02a4:231_25: jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya,
atk-vin02a4:231_26: jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ neva attanā paṭicodeyya,
atk-vin02a4:233_1: Idāni “sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇa”nti imaṃ purimapañhaṃ vissajjento “vīsaṃ dve satānī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:233_2: Tattha bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇesu cha saṅghādisesāti vissaṭṭhi,
atk-vin02a4:233_5: Dve aniyatehi aṭṭhāti dvīhi aniyatehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha ime.
atk-vin02a4:236_0: Chabbassāni nisīdanaṃ, dve lomā paṭhamo patto;
atk-vin02a4:244_0: Nisīdane ca yā sikkhā, vassikā yā ca sāṭikā;
atk-vin02a4:246_0: Bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇesupi saṅghamhā dasa nissareti “saṅghamhā nissārīyatī”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:246_1: mātikāyaṃ pana “nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti evaṃ āgatā dasa.
atk-vin02a4:246_5: iti satañceva tiṃsañca sikkhā vibhaṅge bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇā.
atk-vin02a4:247_0: Idāni vipattiyo ca “yehi samathehi sammantī”ti idaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento aṭṭheva pārājikātiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:247_1: Tattha durāsadāti iminā tesaṃ sappaṭibhayataṃ dasseti.
atk-vin02a4:247_2: Kaṇhasappādayo viya hi ete durāsadā durūpagamanā durāsajjanā,
atk-vin02a4:247_4: Tālavatthusamūpamāti sabbaṃ tālaṃ uddharitvā tālassa vatthumattakaraṇena samūpamā.
atk-vin02a4:247_5: Yathā vatthumattakato tālo na puna pākatiko hoti,
atk-vin02a4:248_0: Evaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā puna ekekassa vuttaṃ upamaṃ dassento paṇḍupalāsotiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:248_1: Aviruḷhī bhavanti teti yathā ete paṇḍupalāsādayo punaharitādibhāvena aviruḷhidhammā honti;
atk-vin02a4:248_2: evaṃ pārājikāpi puna pakatisīlābhāvena aviruḷhidhammā hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:248_3: Ettāvatā “vipattiyo ca yehi samathehi sammantī”ti ettha imā tāva aṭṭha pārājikavipattiyo kehici samathehi na sammantīti evaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:249_0: Dve uposathā dve pavāraṇāti idaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:249_9: Pañceva uddesā caturo bhavanti anaññathāti bhikkhūnaṃ pañca uddesā bhikkhunīnaṃ caturo bhavanti,
atk-vin02a4:249_13: adhikaraṇāni cattārīti imā pana vibhattiyo samathehi sammanti,
atk-vin02a4:249_15: Atha vā “dve uposathā dve pavāraṇā cattāri kammāni pañceva uddesā caturo bhavanti,
atk-vin02a4:249_16: anaññathā”ti imāpi catasso vibhattiyo nissāya “nassantete vinassantete”tiādinā nayena yā āpattiyo āpajjanti,
atk-vin02a4:249_18: tasmā taṃmūlakānaṃ āpattīnaṃ samathadassanatthampi tā vibhattiyo vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:249_19: Kiccaṃ ekenāti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati.
atk-vin02a4:251_1: Evaṃ pucchānukkamena sabbapañhe vissajjetvā idāni “āpattikkhandhā ca bhavanti sattā”ti ettha saṅgahitaāpattikkhandhānaṃ
atk-vin02a4:251_5: taṃ āpajjanto puggalo yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno saddhammā cuto paraddho bhaṭṭho niraṅkato ca hoti,
atk-vin02a4:251_6: anihate tasmiṃ puggale puna uposathappavāraṇādibhedo saṃvāso natthi.
atk-vin02a4:251_7: Tenetaṃ iti vuccatīti tena kāraṇena etaṃ āpattipārājikanti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:252_0: Dutiyagāthāyapi byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ saṅghova deti parivāsantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:252_2: imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vuṭṭhātukāmassa yaṃ taṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ tassa ādimhi ceva parivāsadānatthāya ādito
atk-vin02a4:252_3: sese majjhe mānattadānatthāya mūlāyapaṭikassanena vā saha mānattadānatthāya,
atk-vin02a4:252_5: na hettha ekampi kammaṃ vinā saṅghena sakkā kātunti saṅgho,
atk-vin02a4:252_6: ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assāti saṅghādiseso.
atk-vin02a4:253_0: Tatiyagāthāya aniyato na niyatoti yasmā na niyato,
atk-vin02a4:253_4: yasmā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ anekaṃsena katanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:253_7: tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti hi tattha vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:253_11: evaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññataraṃ ṭhānaṃ yattha vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:254_0: Catutthagāthāya accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāminīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi,
atk-vin02a4:254_2: thūlattā accayassa etaṃ thullaccayanti vuccatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:255_0: Pañcamagāthāya nissajjitvāna deseti tenetanti nissajjitvā desetabbato nissaggiyanti vuccatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:256_0: Chaṭṭhagāthāya pāteti kusalaṃ dhammanti sañcicca āpajjantassa kusaladhammasaṅkhātaṃ kusalacittaṃ pāteti,
atk-vin02a4:257_0: Pāṭidesanīyagāthāsu “gārayhaṃ āvuso dhammaṃ āpajji”nti vuttagārayhabhāvakāraṇadassanatthameva bhikkhu aññātako santotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:257_1: Paṭidesetabbato pana sā āpatti pāṭidesanīyāti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:258_0: Dukkaṭagāthāya aparaddhaṃ viraddhañca khalitanti sabbametaṃ “yañca dukkaṭa”nti ettha vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:258_1: Yañhi duṭṭhu kataṃ virūpaṃ vā kataṃ,
atk-vin02a4:258_7: Yaṃ manusso kareti idaṃ panassa opammanidassanaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:258_9: yathā hi yaṃ loke manusso āvi vā yadi vā raho pāpaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:259_0: Dubbhāsitagāthāya dubbhāsitaṃ durābhaṭṭhanti duṭṭhu ābhaṭṭhaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitanti durābhaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:259_5: saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ yasmā taṃ padaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:259_7: yasmā ca naṃ viññū garahantīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:259_8: Tenetaṃ iti vuccatīti tena saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvena ca viññugarahanenāpi ca etaṃ iti vuccati;
atk-vin02a4:260_0: Sekhiyagāthāya “ādi cetaṃ caraṇañcā”tiādinā nayena sekhassa santakabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-vin02a4:260_1: Tasmā sekhassa idaṃ sekhiyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-vin02a4:260_2: Idaṃ “garukalahukañcāpī”tiādipañhehi asaṅgahitassa “handa vākyaṃ suṇoma te”ti iminā pana āyācanavacanena
atk-vin02a4:261_1: Tattha channamativassatīti gehaṃ tāva tiṇādīhi acchannaṃ ativassati.
atk-vin02a4:261_2: Idaṃ pana āpattisaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ channaṃ ativassati;
atk-vin02a4:261_3: mūlāpattiñhi chādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:261_4: Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti gehaṃ tāva avivaṭaṃ succhannaṃ nātivassati.
atk-vin02a4:261_5: Idaṃ pana āpattisaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ vivaṭaṃ nātivassati;
atk-vin02a4:261_6: mūlāpattiñhi vivaranto desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminito vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:261_8: Tasmā channaṃ vivarethāti tena kāraṇena desanāgāminiṃ desento vuṭṭhānagāminito ca vuṭṭhahanto channaṃ vivaretha.
atk-vin02a4:261_9: Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatīti evañcetaṃ vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:262_0: Gati migānaṃ pavananti ajjhokāse byagghādīhi paripātiyamānānaṃ migānaṃ pavanaṃ rukkhādigahanaṃ araññaṃ gati paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:262_3: Avassaṃ upagamanaṭṭhena pana vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:262_5: Na hi te vināsaṃ agacchantā ṭhātuṃ sakkonti.
atk-vin02a4:262_6: Sucirampi ṭhatvā pana nibbānaṃ arahato gati,
atk-vin02a4:262_7: khīṇāsavassa arahato anupādisesanibbānadhātu ekaṃsena gatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:266_1: Adhikaraṇabhede ime dasa ukkoṭāti adhikaraṇānaṃ ukkoṭetvā puna adhikaraṇaukkoṭena samathānaṃ ukkoṭaṃ
atk-vin02a4:266_3: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento dve samathe ukkoṭetīti sammukhāvinayañca yebhuyyasikañca ime dve ukkoṭeti,
atk-vin02a4:266_13: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭento ekanti sammukhāvinayaṃ imaṃ ekaṃ samathaṃ ukkoṭeti.
atk-vin02a4:267_1: Kati ukkoṭātiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane pana dvādasasu ukkoṭesu akataṃ kammantiādayo tāva tayo ukkoṭā visesato dutiye anuvādādhikaraṇe labbhanti.
atk-vin02a4:267_2: Anihataṃ kammantiādayo tayo paṭhame vivādādhikaraṇe labbhanti.
atk-vin02a4:267_5: apica dvādasāpi ca ekekasmiṃ adhikaraṇe labbhantiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:268_0: Tatthajātakaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭetīti yasmiṃ vihāre “mayhaṃ iminā patto gahito,
atk-vin02a4:268_1: cīvaraṃ gahita”ntiādinā nayena pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya adhikaraṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:268_2: tasmiṃyeva ca naṃ vihāre āvāsikā sannipatitvā “alaṃ āvuso”ti attapaccatthike saññāpetvā pāḷimuttakavinicchayeneva vūpasamenti,
atk-vin02a4:269_0: Tatthajātakaṃ vūpasantanti sace pana taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nevāsikā vūpasametuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-vin02a4:269_1: athañño vinayadharo āgantvā “kiṃ āvuso imasmiṃ vihāre uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā ṭhitā”ti pucchati,
atk-vin02a4:269_2: tehi ca tasmiṃ kāraṇe kathite taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ khandhakato ca parivārato ca suttena vinicchinitvā vūpasameti,
atk-vin02a4:270_0: Antarāmaggeti te attapaccatthikā “na mayaṃ etassa vinicchaye tiṭṭhāma,
atk-vin02a4:270_2: asukasmiṃ nāma gāme vinayadharā therā vasanti,
atk-vin02a4:270_3: tattha gantvā vinicchinissāmā”ti gacchantā antarāmaggeyeva kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā aññamaññaṃ vā saññāpenti,
atk-vin02a4:270_6: Evaṃ vūpasantaṃ antarāmagge adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti yo,
atk-vin02a4:271_0: Antarāmagge vūpasantanti na heva kho pana aññamaññaṃ saññattiyā vā sabhāgabhikkhunijjhāpanena vā vūpasantaṃ hoti;
atk-vin02a4:271_1: apica kho paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto eko vinayadharo disvā “kattha āvuso gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:271_3: kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti tattheva dhammena vinayena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameti,
atk-vin02a4:272_1: kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti vuccamānāpi “mayaṃ tattheva gantvā vinicchayaṃ pāpessāmā”ti vinayadharassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā gacchantiyeva,
atk-vin02a4:272_4: saṅghasannipātaṃ nāma garuka”nti tattheva nisīdāpetvā vinicchinitvā saññāpenti,
atk-vin02a4:272_6: Evaṃ vūpasantaṃ tattha gataṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti yo,
atk-vin02a4:273_0: Tattha gataṃ vūpasantanti na heva kho pana sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā vūpasantaṃ hoti;
atk-vin02a4:273_1: apica kho saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā ārocitaṃ saṅghamajjhe vinayadharā vūpasamenti,
atk-vin02a4:274_2: Ummattakassa dinne amūḷhavinaye pāpussannassa dinnāya tassapāpiyasikāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-vin02a4:275_0: Tiṇavatthārakaṃ ukkoṭetīti saṅghena tiṇavatthārakasamathena vūpasamite adhikaraṇe “āpatti nāma ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-vin02a4:275_1: upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā desiyamānā vuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a4:275_3: etaṃ mayhaṃ na khamatī”ti evaṃ vadantopi tiṇavatthārakaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma,
atk-vin02a4:276_0: Chandāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭetīti vinayadharo hutvā attano upajjhāyādīnaṃ atthāya “adhammaṃ
atk-vin02a4:276_1: dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā pubbe vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvādasasu ukkoṭesu yena kenaci ukkoṭento chandāgatiṃ
atk-vin02a4:276_3: Dvīsu pana attapaccatthikesu ekasmiṃ “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā nayena samuppannāghāto,
atk-vin02a4:276_4: tassa parājayaṃ āropanatthaṃ “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā pubbe vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvādasasu
atk-vin02a4:276_5: ukkoṭesu yena kenaci ukkoṭento dosāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:276_6: Mando pana momūho momūhattā eva “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā vuttanayeneva ukkoṭento mohāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:276_7: Sace pana dvīsu attapaccatthikesu eko visamāni kāyakammādīni gahanamicchādiṭṭhiṃ balavante ca pakkhantariye
atk-vin02a4:276_8: abhiññāte bhikkhū nissitattā visamanissito gahananissito balavanissito ca hoti,
atk-vin02a4:276_9: tassa bhayena “ayaṃ me jīvitantarāyaṃ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā kareyyā”ti “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni
atk-vin02a4:276_10: dīpetvā vuttanayeneva ukkoṭento bhayāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:277_0: Tadahupasampannoti eko sāmaṇero byatto hoti bahussuto,
atk-vin02a4:277_1: so vinicchaye parājayaṃ patvā maṅkubhūte bhikkhū disvā pucchati “kasmā maṅkubhūtātthā”ti?
atk-vin02a4:277_7: So dutiyadivase bheriṃ paharitvā saṅghaṃ sannipāteti.
atk-vin02a4:277_8: Tato bhikkhūhi “kena saṅgho sannipātito”ti vutte “mayā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a4:277_15: So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:278_0: Kārakoti ekaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā pariveṇagataṃ parājitā bhikkhū vadanti “kissa, bhante,
atk-vin02a4:278_3: So “kasmā paṭhamaṃyeva evaṃ na vaditthā”ti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti.
atk-vin02a4:278_6: Chandadāyakoti eko adhikaraṇavinicchaye chandaṃ datvā sabhāge bhikkhū parājayaṃ patvā āgate maṅkubhūte
atk-vin02a4:278_7: disvā “sve dāni ahaṃ vinicchinissāmī”ti saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā “kasmā sannipātesī”ti vutte “hiyyo adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-vin02a4:278_12: So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:281_5: Āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjatīti evaṃ āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakaāpattivasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:281_8: Ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nissāya uppajjanakakiccānaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:282_0: Dutiyapucchāya hetunidānantiādimhi vissajjane navannaṃ kusalākusalābyākatahetūnaṃ vasena hetunidānāditā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:283_1: Mūlapucchāya vissajjane dvādasa mūlānīti kodhaupanāhayugaḷakādīni cha vivādāmūlāni,
atk-vin02a4:283_3: alobhādosāmohā tayoti imāni ajjhattasantānappavattāni dvādasa mūlāni.
atk-vin02a4:283_4: Cuddasa mūlānīti tāneva dvādasa kāyavācāhi saddhiṃ cuddasa honti.
atk-vin02a4:285_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattītiādibhede ekena adhikaraṇena kiccādhikaraṇenāti idaṃ yena adhikaraṇena sammanti,
atk-vin02a4:285_4: Na hi puggalassa santike desentassa kiccādhikaraṇaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:286_0: Na katamena samathenāti sāvasesāpatti viya na sammati.
atk-vin02a4:288_1: Tato paraṃ yattha sativinayotiādikā sammukhāvinayaṃ amuñcitvā cha yamakapucchā vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:289_1: Saṃsaṭṭhādipucchānaṃ vissajjane saṃsaṭṭhāti sativinayakammavācākkhaṇasmiṃyeva dvinnampi samathānaṃ siddhattā
atk-vin02a4:289_2: sammukhāvinayoti vā sativinayoti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā,
atk-vin02a4:289_4: Yasmā pana kadalikkhandhe pattavaṭṭīnaṃ viya na sakkā tesaṃ vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-vin02a4:289_5: tena vuttaṃ “na ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetu”nti.
atk-vin02a4:291_11: Bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ asakkuṇeyyatā yebhuyyasikāya nidānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:292_2: Samuṭṭhānapucchāya kiñcāpi “sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katame chattiṃsa samuṭṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:292_3: sammukhāvinayassa pana kammasaṅgahābhāvena samuṭṭhānābhāvato channaṃyeva samathānaṃ cha samuṭṭhānāni vibhattāni.
atk-vin02a4:292_9: aññaṃ saddhivihārikādikaṃ “idaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti ajjhesananti attho.
atk-vin02a4:292_15: Iti channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena chattiṃsa samuṭṭhānā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:294_2: Adhikaraṇapucchāvissajjane ayaṃ vivādo no adhikaraṇanti ayaṃ mātāputtādīnaṃ vivādo viruddhavādattā vivādo nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:294_3: samathehi pana adhikaraṇīyatāya abhāvato adhikaraṇaṃ na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:298_1: Dutiyagāthāsaṅgaṇiyaṃ codanāti vatthuñca āpattiñca dassetvā codanā.
atk-vin02a4:298_4: Matikammaṃ pana kissa kāraṇāti matikammaṃ vuccati mantaggahaṇaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:299_2: Niggahatthāya sāraṇāti dosasāraṇā pana tassa puggalassa niggahatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:299_3: Saṅgho pariggahatthāyāti tattha sannipatito saṅgho vinicchayapariggahaṇatthāya;
atk-vin02a4:299_5: Matikammaṃ pana pāṭiyekkanti suttantikattherānañca vinayadharattherānañca mantaggahaṇaṃ pāṭekkaṃ pāṭekkaṃ vinicchayasanniṭṭhāpanatthaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:300_0: Mā kho paṭighanti cuditake vā codake vā kopaṃ mā janayi.
atk-vin02a4:300_1: Sace anuvijjako tuvanti sace tvaṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ nisinno vinayadharo.
atk-vin02a4:301_4: Sutte vinaye vātiādīsu suttaṃ nāma ubhatovibhaṅgo.
atk-vin02a4:302_1: Kusalena buddhimatā katanti chekena paṇḍitena ñāṇapāramippattena bhagavatā nīharitvā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:302_9: Yaṃ pana kusalena buddhimatā lokanāthena etesu suttādīsu anuyogavattaṃ kathaṃ supaññattaṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ anulomaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:302_11: Gatiṃ na nāsento samparāyikanti attano samparāye sugatinibbattiṃ anāsento anuyogavattaṃ nisāmaya.
atk-vin02a4:302_19: ajjhesitakāleyeva tava bhāre kate anuyuñjāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:303_0: Sahasā vohāraṃ mā padhāresīti yo etesaṃ sahasā vohāro hoti,
atk-vin02a4:304_0: Paṭiññānusandhitena kārayeti ettha anusandhitanti kathānusandhi vuccati,
atk-vin02a4:304_3: Atha vā paṭiññāya ca anusandhitena ca kāraye,
atk-vin02a4:304_8: yā assa vattena saddhiṃ paṭiññā sandhiyati,
atk-vin02a4:305_0: Sañciccāti jānanto āpajjati. Parigūhatīti nigūhati na deseti na vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:306_0: Sā ahampi jānāmīti yaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:306_3: Aññañca tāhanti aññañca taṃ ahaṃ pucchāmi.
atk-vin02a4:307_0: Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purekathitañca pacchākathitañca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:307_2: Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivacanaṃ vinicchayānusandhivacanañca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:308_3: diṭṭhivipattiyā codento micchādiṭṭhiyā ceva antaggāhikadiṭṭhiyā ca codeti.
atk-vin02a4:308_4: Ājīvenapi codetīti ājīvahetupaññattehi chahi sikkhāpadehi codeti.
