atk-vin02a4:312_1: Idāni evaṃ uppannāya codanāya vinayadharena kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ anuvijjakenātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:312_3: ekeneko mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhānato nikkhamanto vā pavisanto vā diṭṭho,
atk-vin02a4:312_6: Taṃ pana dassanaṃ paṭicca pārājikaṃ na upeti,
atk-vin02a4:312_9: taṃ tassa “diṭṭho mayā”ti iminā diṭṭhavacanena sameti.
atk-vin02a4:312_10: Yasmā pana itaro taṃ dassanaṃ paṭicca dosaṃ na paṭijānāti,
atk-vin02a4:312_13: Tassa puggalassa “suddho aha”nti paṭiññāya tena saddhiṃ uposatho kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:315_1: Codanāya ko ādītiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane sacce ca akuppe cāti sacce patiṭṭhātabbaṃ akuppe ca.
atk-vin02a4:315_2: Yaṃ kataṃ vā na kataṃ vā,
atk-vin02a4:315_4: na ca codake vā anuvijjake vā saṅghe vā kopo uppādetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:315_5: Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbanti otiṇṇañca anotiṇṇañca vacanaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:315_14: anuvijjako appamattakampi ahāpento “āvuso samannāharitvā ujuṃ katvā āharā”ti vattabbo,
atk-vin02a4:315_16: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatīti ettha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu.
atk-vin02a4:315_19: Etena hi dhammena ca vinayena ca satthusāsanena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:315_20: tasmā anuvijjakena bhūtena vatthunā codetvā āpattiṃ sāretvā ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:316_2: Avasānagāthāsu there ca paribhāsatīti avamaññaṃ karonto “kiṃ ime jānantī”ti paribhāsati.
atk-vin02a4:316_3: Khato upahatindriyoti tāya chandādigāmitāya tena ca paribhāsanena attanā attano khatattā khato.
atk-vin02a4:316_6: na ca sikkhāya gāravoti so khato upahatindriyo paññāya abhāvato dummedho tīsu sikkhāsu asikkhanato na
atk-vin02a4:316_7: ca sikkhāya gāravo kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upagacchati,
atk-vin02a4:316_10: Tassattho na ca āmisaṃ nissāya kare,
atk-vin02a4:316_11: cuditakacodakesu hi aññatarena dinnaṃ cīvarādiāmisaṃ gaṇhanto āmisaṃ nissāya karoti,
atk-vin02a4:316_13: Na ca nissāya puggalanti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”tiādinā nayena chandādīhi gacchanto puggalaṃ nissāya karoti,
atk-vin02a4:316_15: Atha kho ubhopete vivajjetvā yathā dhammo ṭhito,
atk-vin02a4:318_0: Akālena ca codetīti anokāse anajjhiṭṭhova codeti.
atk-vin02a4:318_1: Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purimakathañca pacchimakathañca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:319_0: Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivinicchayānusandhivasena vacanaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:323_1: Cūḷasaṅgāme saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunāti saṅgāmo vuccati adhikaraṇavinicchayatthāya saṅghasannipāto.
atk-vin02a4:323_2: Tatra hi attapaccatthikā ceva sāsanapaccatthikā ca uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ dīpentā samosaranti vesālikā vajjiputtakā viya.
atk-vin02a4:323_3: Yo bhikkhu tesaṃ paccatthikānaṃ laddhiṃ madditvā sakavādadīpanatthāya tattha avacarati,
atk-vin02a4:323_6: Tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:323_9: yathā rajoharaṇassa saṃkiliṭṭhe vā asaṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne neva rāgo na doso;
atk-vin02a4:323_11: Yathāpatirūpe āsaneti yathāpatirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā attano pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhiṃ adassetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:323_12: Anānākathikenāti nānāvidhaṃ taṃ taṃ anatthakathaṃ akathentena.
atk-vin02a4:323_14: Sāmaṃ vā dhammo bhāsitabboti saṅghasannipātaṭṭhāne kappiyākappiyanissitā vā rūpārūpaparicchedasamathācāravipassanācāraṭṭhānanisajjavattādinissitā
atk-vin02a4:323_18: Yo bhikkhu tathārūpiṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ pahoti,
atk-vin02a4:323_21: Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabboti ariyā tuṇhī nisīdantā na bālaputhujjanā viya nisīdanti.
atk-vin02a4:323_23: Iti kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena tuṇhībhāvo ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma,
atk-vin02a4:323_26: attano patirūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva nisīditabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:324_0: Na upajjhāyo pucchitabboti “ko nāmo tuyhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti na pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:324_2: Na jātīti “khattiyajātiyo tvaṃ brāhmaṇajātiyo”ti evaṃ jāti na pucchitabbā.
atk-vin02a4:324_3: Na āgamoti “dīghabhāṇakosi tvaṃ majjhimabhāṇako”ti evaṃ āgamo na pucchitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:324_5: Atrassa pemaṃ vā doso vāti atra puggale etesaṃ kāraṇānaṃ aññataravasena pemaṃ vā bhaveyya doso vā.
atk-vin02a4:325_0: No parisakappikenāti parisakappakena parisānuvidhāyakena na bhavitabbaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:325_2: tadeva cetetvā kappetvā na kathetabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:325_3: Na hatthamuddā dassetabbāti kathetabbe ca akathetabbe ca saññājananatthaṃ hatthavikāro na kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:326_0: Atthaṃ anuvidhiyantenāti vinicchayapaṭivedhameva sallakkhentena “idaṃ suttaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-vin02a4:326_1: imasmiṃ vinicchaye idaṃ vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ paritulayantena nisīditabbanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:326_2: Na ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbanti na āsanā vuṭṭhāya sannipātamaṇḍale vicaritabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:326_5: Na kummaggo sevitabboti na āpatti dīpetabbā.
atk-vin02a4:326_9: Hitaparisakkināti hitesinā hitagavesinā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti ayaṃ padadvayepi adhippāyo.
atk-vin02a4:326_13: Attā pariggahetabboti “vinicchinituṃ vūpasametuṃ sakkhissāmi nu kho no”ti evaṃ attā pariggahetabbo;
atk-vin02a4:326_15: Paro pariggahetabboti “lajjiyā nu kho ayaṃ parisā,
atk-vin02a4:326_16: sakkā saññāpetuṃ udāhu no”ti evaṃ paro pariggahetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_0: Codako pariggahetabboti “dhammacodako nu kho no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_1: Cuditako pariggahetabboti “dhammacuditako nu kho no”ti evaṃ pariggahetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_7: “nanu tvaṃ kulaputto”ti uttejetvā anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetvā tassa anuyogo gaṇhitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_8: Bhīrū assāsetabboti yassa saṅghamajjhaṃ vā gaṇamajjhaṃ vā anosaṭapubbattā sārajjaṃ uppajjati,
atk-vin02a4:327_11: mayaṃ te upatthambhā bhavissāmā”ti vatvāpi anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_13: Asuci vibhāvetabboti alajjiṃ pakāsetvā āpattiṃ desāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:327_14: Ujumaddavenāti yo bhikkhu uju sīlavā kāyavaṅkādirahito,
atk-vin02a4:327_16: Dhammesu ca puggalesu cāti ettha yo dhammagaruko hoti na puggalagaruko,
atk-vin02a4:327_17: ayameva dhammesu ca puggalesu ca majjhattoti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:328_1: Suttaṃ saṃsandanatthāyātiādīsu tena ca pana evaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyamanāpagarubhāvanīyena anuvijjakena
atk-vin02a4:328_7: Okāsakammaṃ codanatthāyāti vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā codanatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:328_10: Savacanīyaṃ palibodhatthāyāti savacanīyaṃ “imamhā āvāsā paraṃ mā pakkamī”ti evaṃ palibodhatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:328_16: Paccekaṭṭhāyino avisaṃvādakaṭṭhāyinoti issariyādhipaccajeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ca avisaṃvādakaṭṭhāne ca ṭhitā;
atk-vin02a4:329_0: Idāni ye mandā mandabuddhino evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “vinayo nāma kimatthāyā”ti tesaṃ vacanokāsapidahanatthamattaṃ dassetuṃ vinayo saṃvaratthāyātiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:329_1: Tattha vinayo saṃvaratthāyāti sakalāpi vinayapaññatti kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāya.
atk-vin02a4:329_18: Catubbidhopi hi ariyamaggo arahattaphalassa upanissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:329_23: Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etadatthā.
atk-vin02a4:329_27: Imaṃ kathaṃ sutvā yaṃ uppajjati ñāṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:329_29: Yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho,
atk-vin02a4:331_1: nidānaṃ ākāraakovido pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti “vatthu”ntiādīni “na jānātī”ti padena sambandho.
atk-vin02a4:331_4: yo bhikkhu pārājikādīnaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:331_7: “idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ asukasmiṃ nāma nagare paññatta”nti evaṃ nidānaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:331_8: “idaṃ purimavacanaṃ idaṃ pacchimavacana”nti pubbāparaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:331_9: “idaṃ kataṃ idaṃ akata”nti katākataṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:331_10: Samena cāti teneva pubbāparaṃ ajānanassa samena aññāṇena,
atk-vin02a4:331_18: sa ve tādisako bhikkhu apaṭikkhoti vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:332_0: Kammañca adhikaraṇañcāti imesampi padānaṃ “na jānātī”ti padeneva sambandho.
atk-vin02a4:332_2: tatheva iti yvāyaṃ kammañca na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:332_5: rāgādīhi pana ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca,
atk-vin02a4:332_8: rattattā pana duṭṭhattā ca chandā dosā ca gacchati,
atk-vin02a4:332_9: paraṃ saññāpetuṃ asamatthatāya na ca saññattikusalo,
atk-vin02a4:332_10: kāraṇākāraṇadassane asamatthatāya nijjhattiyā ca akovido attano sadisāya parisāya laddhattā laddhapakkho,
atk-vin02a4:332_14: sa ve tādisako bhikkhu apaṭikkhoti vuccati,
atk-vin02a4:336_2: vatthuto vā vatthuṃ saṅkamatīti “paṭhamapārājikavatthu mayā diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vatvā puna pucchiyamāno
atk-vin02a4:336_3: nighaṃsiyamāno “na mayā paṭhamapārājikassa vatthu diṭṭhaṃ, na sutaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:336_4: dutiyapārājikassa vatthu diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vadati.
atk-vin02a4:336_8: na suta”nti vatvā pacchā “mayāpetaṃ diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a4:336_9: “diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā”ti vatvā pacchā “na diṭṭhaṃ vā na sutaṃ vā”ti vadati,
atk-vin02a4:337_4: Iti imāni pañca methunadhammassa pubbabhāgo pubbapayogoti veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:340_1: Bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hotīti vinayadharena hi evaṃ chandādigatiyā adhikaraṇe vinicchite tasmiṃ vihāre saṅgho dvidhā bhijjati.
atk-vin02a4:340_3: Upāsakāpi upāsikāyopi dārakāpi dārikāyopi tesaṃ ārakkhadevatāpi tatheva dvidhā bhijjanti.
atk-vin02a4:340_4: Tato bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmāno dvidhāva honti.
atk-vin02a4:343_0: 394. Yaṃ atthāyāti yadatthāya. Taṃ atthanti so attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:347_1: aṭṭha mātikāti khandhake vuttā pakkamanantikādikā aṭṭha.
atk-vin02a4:348_1: Payogassāti cīvaradhovanādino sattavidhassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya yo udakāharaṇādiko payogo kayirati,
atk-vin02a4:348_3: Katame dhammā anantarapaccayena paccayoti anāgatavasena anantarā hutvā katame dhammā paccayā hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:348_6: Nissayapaccayenāti uppajjamānassa payogassa nissayaṃ ādhārabhāvaṃ upagatā viya hutvā katame dhammā paccayā hontīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:348_9: Purejātapaccayenāti iminā paṭhamaṃ uppannassa paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:348_10: Pacchājātapaccayenāti iminā pacchā uppajjanakassa paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:348_11: Sahajātapaccayenāti iminā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjamānānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:348_16: Mātikānañca palibodhānañcāti aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ dvinnañca palibodhānaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:349_0: Evaṃ yañca labbhati yañca na labbhati,
atk-vin02a4:349_1: sabbaṃ pucchitvā idāni yaṃ yassa labbhati,
atk-vin02a4:349_2: tadeva dassento pubbakaraṇaṃ payogassātiādinā nayena vissajjanamāha.
atk-vin02a4:349_8: Payogassa hi sattavidhampi pubbakaraṇaṃ yasmā tena payogena nipphādetabbassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya so payogo kayirati,
atk-vin02a4:349_9: tasmā imehi catūhi paccayehi paccayo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:349_10: Purejātapaccaye panesa uddiṭṭhadhammesu ekadhammampi na labhati,
atk-vin02a4:349_18: Pacchā uppajjanakassa hi pubbakaraṇassa atthāya so payogo kayirati.
atk-vin02a4:349_19: Sahajātapaccayaṃ pana mātikāpalibodhānisaṃsasaṅkhāte pannarasa dhamme ṭhapetvā añño payogādīsu ekopi dhammo na labhati,
atk-vin02a4:349_20: te eva hi pannarasa dhammā saha kathinatthārena ekato nipphajjantīti aññamaññaṃ sahajātapaccayā honti.
atk-vin02a4:352_1: “Payogo kiṃnidāno”tiādīsu pucchādvayavissajjanesu hetunidāno paccayanidānoti ettha cha cīvarāni hetu ceva paccayo cāti veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:352_4: Na hi chabbidhe cīvare asati payogo atthi,
atk-vin02a4:353_4: iminā antaravāsakena kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti etena vacībhedena.
atk-vin02a4:354_2: Kālavipannaṃ nāma ajja dāyakehi dinnaṃ sve saṅgho kathinatthārakassa deti.
atk-vin02a4:356_2: tesaññeva dhammānanti yesu rūpādidhammesu sati kathinaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:356_4: Nāmaṃ nāmakammantiādinā pana “kathina”nti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:356_5: na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dasseti.
atk-vin02a4:357_1: Sattarasahi ākārehīti “ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathina”ntiādīhi pubbe vuttakāraṇehi.
atk-vin02a4:357_2: Nimittakammādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ sabbaṃ kathinakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:358_8: Nirujjhamānā panettha purimā dve atthārena saddhiṃ ekato nirujjhanti,
atk-vin02a4:358_10: Atthārassa hi nirodho etesañca uddhārabhāvo ekakkhaṇe hoti,
atk-vin02a4:364_1: Upālipañhesu katihi nu kho bhanteti pucchāya ayaṃ sambandho.
atk-vin02a4:364_2: Thero kira rahogato sabbāni imāni pañcakāni āvajjetvā “bhagavantaṃ dāni pucchitvā imesaṃ nissāya vasanakādīnaṃ
atk-vin02a4:364_3: atthāya tantiṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “katihi nu kho bhante”tiādinā nayena pañhe pucchi.
atk-vin02a4:364_4: Tesaṃ vissajjane uposathaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ uposathaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:364_5: Uposathakammaṃ na jānātīti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ catubbidhaṃ uposathakammaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:364_6: Pātimokkhaṃ na jānātīti dve mātikā na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:364_7: Pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānātīti bhikkhūnaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ catubbidhanti navavidhaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:365_0: Pavāraṇaṃ na jānātīti navavidhaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:365_1: Pavāraṇākammaṃ na jānātīti adhammenavaggādibhedaṃ catubbidhaṃ pavāraṇākammaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:366_0: Āpattānāpattiṃ na jānātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ āpattiñca anāpattiñca na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:367_0: Āpanno kammakatoti āpattiṃ āpanno tappaccayāva saṅghena kammaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:369_1: Kammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbanti ayaṃ yasmā anulomavatte na vattati,
atk-vin02a4:370_1: Sace upāli saṅgho samaggakaraṇīyāni kammāni karotīti sace samaggehi karaṇīyāni uposathādīni kammāni karoti,
atk-vin02a4:370_2: uposathapavāraṇādīsu hi ṭhitāsu upatthambho na dātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:370_3: Sace hi saṅgho accayaṃ desāpetvā saṅghasāmaggiṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:370_6: Tatra ceti sace tādise kamme bhikkhuno nakkhamati,
atk-vin02a4:370_9: Yatra pana uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ dīpenti,
atk-vin02a4:371_0: Ussitamantī cāti lobhadosamohamānussannaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kaṇhavāco anatthakadīpano.
atk-vin02a4:371_1: Nissitajappīti attano dhammatāya ussadayuttaṃ bhāsituṃ na sakkoti;
atk-vin02a4:371_2: atha kho “mayā saddhiṃ rājā evaṃ kathesi,
atk-vin02a4:371_4: asuko nāma mayhaṃ ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā tepiṭako mayā saddhiṃ evaṃ kathesī”ti evaṃ aññaṃ nissāya jappati.
atk-vin02a4:371_5: Na ca bhāsānusandhikusaloti kathānusandhivacane ca vinicchayānusandhivacane ca akusalo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:371_6: Na yathādhamme yathāvinayeti na bhūtena vatthunā āpattiṃ sāretvā codetā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:372_0: Ussādetā hotīti “amhākaṃ ācariyo mahātepiṭako paramadhammakathiko”tiādinā nayena ekaccaṃ ussādeti.
atk-vin02a4:372_1: Dutiyapade “āpattiṃ kiṃ so na jānātī”tiādinā ekaccaṃ apasādeti.
atk-vin02a4:372_4: Samphañca bahuṃ bhāsatīti bahuṃ niratthakakathaṃ katheti.
atk-vin02a4:373_0: Pasayha pavattā hotīti anajjhiṭṭho bhāre anāropite kevalaṃ mānaṃ nissāya ajjhottharitvā anadhikāre kathetā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:373_1: Anokāsakammaṃ kāretvāti okāsakammaṃ akāretvā pavattā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:373_2: Na yathādiṭṭhiyā byākatā hotīti yassa attano diṭṭhi taṃ purakkhatvā na byākatā;
atk-vin02a4:373_3: laddhiṃ nikkhipitvā ayathābhuccaṃ adhammādīsu dhammādiladdhiko hutvā kathetā hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:375_1: Āpattiyā payogaṃ na jānātīti “ayaṃ āpatti kāyappayogā,
atk-vin02a4:375_3: Āpattiyā vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “ayaṃ āpatti desanāya vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:375_5: ayaṃ neva desanāya na vuṭṭhānenā”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:375_6: Āpattiyā na vinicchayakusalo hotīti “imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ayaṃ āpattī”ti na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:375_7: dosānurūpaṃ āpattiṃ uddharitvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-vin02a4:376_0: Adhikaraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya samuṭṭhāti,
atk-vin02a4:376_2: idaṃ pañca vā satta vā āpattikkhandhe,
atk-vin02a4:376_3: idaṃ cattāri saṅghakiccāni nissāya samuṭṭhātī”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:376_10: Vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:376_13: idaṃ ekena samathena vūpasamatī”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:376_14: Na vinicchayakusalo hotīti adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā samathaṃ pāpetuṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:377_0: Kammaṃ na jānātīti tajjanīyādi sattavidhaṃ kammaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:377_1: Kammassa karaṇaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ kammaṃ iminā nīhārena kātabba”nti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:377_2: Kammassa vatthuṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ tajjanīyassa vatthu,
atk-vin02a4:377_4: Vattanti sattasu kammesu heṭṭhā catunnaṃ kammānaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ tividhassa ca ukkhepanīyakammassa tecattālīsavidhaṃ vattaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:377_5: Kammassa vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti “yo bhikkhu vatte vattitvā yācati,
atk-vin02a4:378_0: Vatthuṃ na jānātīti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vatthuṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:378_1: Nidānaṃ na jānātīti “idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ imasmiṃ nagare paññattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:378_3: Paññattiṃ na jānātīti paññattianupaññattianuppannapaññattivasena tividhaṃ paññattiṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:378_4: Padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti sammukhā kātabbaṃ padaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:378_5: “Buddho bhagavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā buddho”ti heṭṭhupariyaṃ katvā padaṃ yojeti.
atk-vin02a4:379_0: Akusalo ca hoti vinayeti vinayapāḷiyañca aṭṭhakathāyañca akusalo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:380_0: Ñattiṃ na jānātīti saṅkhepato hi duvidhā ñatti –
atk-vin02a4:380_1: “esā ñattī”ti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā ca aniddiṭṭhā ca.
atk-vin02a4:380_6: taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:380_7: Ñattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānātīti navasu ṭhānesu kammañattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:380_11: Ñattiyā samathaṃ na jānātīti yvāyaṃ sativinayo,
atk-vin02a4:380_14: tiṇavatthārakoti catubbidho samatho ñattiyā vinā na hoti,
atk-vin02a4:380_16: Ñattiyā vūpasamaṃ na jānātīti yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ iminā catubbidhena ñattisamathena vūpasamati,
atk-vin02a4:380_17: tassa taṃ vūpasamaṃ “ayaṃ ñattiyā vūpasamo kato”ti na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_0: Suttaṃ na jānātīti ubhatovibhaṅgaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_1: Suttānulomaṃ na jānātīti cattāro mahāpadese na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_2: Vinayaṃ na jānātīti khandhakaparivāraṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_3: Vinayānulomaṃ na jānātīti cattāro mahāpadeseyeva na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:381_4: Na ca ṭhānāṭhānakusaloti kāraṇākāraṇakusalo na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:382_0: Dhammaṃ na jānātīti ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:382_1: Dhammānulomaṃ na jānātīti suttantike cattāro mahāpadese na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:382_2: Vinayaṃ na jānātīti khandhakaparivārameva na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:382_3: Vinayānulomaṃ na jānātīti cattāro mahāpadese na jānāti.
atk-vin02a4:382_6: “vinayanti sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ na jānātī”ti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:382_7: Na ca pubbāparakusalo hotīti purekathāya ca pacchākathāya ca akusalo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:382_8: Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttapaṭipakkhavasena ñeyyattā pubbe pakāsitattā ca uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a4:385_4: Anāpattiyā diṭṭhiṃ āvi karotīti anāpattimeva āpattīti desetīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:386_0: Catūhi pañcahi diṭṭhinti yathā catūhi pañcahi diṭṭhi āvikatā hoti,
atk-vin02a4:386_2: cattāro pañca janā ekato āpattiṃ desentīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:386_4: vacībhedaṃ akatvā citteneva āpattiṃ desetīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:387_0: Nānāsaṃvāsakassāti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakassa vā kammanānāsaṃvāsakassa vā santike diṭṭhiṃ āvikaroti;
atk-vin02a4:387_2: Nānāsīmāyāti samānasaṃvāsakassāpi nānāsīmāya ṭhitassa santike āvikaroti.
atk-vin02a4:387_3: Māḷakasīmāya hi ṭhitena sīmantarikāya ṭhitassa sīmantarikāya vā ṭhitena avippavāsasīmāya ṭhitassāpi āpattiṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:388_1: Nālaṃ okāsakammaṃ kātunti na pariyattaṃ kātuṃ;
atk-vin02a4:388_3: Idhāpi apakatatto ukkhittako ca ṭhapitauposathapavāraṇo ca.
atk-vin02a4:389_1: Mandattā momūhattāti mandabhāvena momūhabhāvena vissajjitampi jānituṃ asamattho,
atk-vin02a4:389_2: kevalaṃ attano momūhabhāvaṃ pakāsentoyeva pucchati ummattako viya.
atk-vin02a4:389_3: Pāpicchoti “evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī”ti pāpikāya icchāya pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:389_7: Attādānavagge ca dhutaṅgavagge ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-vin02a4:392_7: “yo te vihāre vasatī”tiādinā pariyāyena jānantassa vuttamusāvādo thullaccayagāmī,
atk-vin02a4:393_1: Kappiyākappiyesu hi kukkucce uppanne vinayadharaṃ disvā kappiyākappiyabhāvaṃ paṭipucchitvā akappiyaṃ pahāya kappiyaṃ kareyya,
atk-vin02a4:393_2: taṃ apassanto pana akappiyampi kappiyanti karonto āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:393_3: Evaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ āpattiṃ vinayadharassa dassanena nāpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:393_6: Assavanenāti ekavihārepi vasanto pana vinayadharassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kappiyākappiyaṃ apucchitvā vā aññesañca vuccamānaṃ asuṇanto āpajjatiyeva,
atk-vin02a4:393_10: Akappiye kappiyasaññitāya āpajjanto pana tathāsaññī āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:397_1: “Katihi nu kho bhante aṅgehi samannāgatāya bhikkhuniyā kammaṃ kātabba”nti sattannaṃ kammānaṃ aññataraṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-vin02a4:398_2: Yasmā pana khīṇāsavo bhikkhu na visaṃvādeti,
atk-vin02a4:398_3: tathārūpassa kathāmaggassa sāmī hutvā katheti, na itaro;
atk-vin02a4:398_4: tasmā paṭhamapañcake “na asekkhenā”ti paṭikkhipitvā dutiyapañcake “asekkhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:399_0: Na atthapaṭisambhidāpattoti aṭṭhakathāya paṭisambhidāpatto pabhedagatañāṇappatto na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:399_1: Na dhammapaṭisambhidāpattoti pāḷidhamme paṭisambhidāpatto na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:399_2: Na niruttipaṭisambhidāpattoti vohāraniruttiyaṃ paṭisambhidāpatto na hoti.
atk-vin02a4:399_3: Na paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāpattoti yāni tāni paṭibhānasaṅkhātāni atthapaṭisambhidādīni ñāṇāni,
atk-vin02a4:399_5: Yathāvimuttaṃ cittaṃ na paccavekkhitāti catunnaṃ phalavimuttīnaṃ vasena yathāvimuttaṃ cittaṃ ekūnavīsatibhedāya paccavekkhaṇāya na paccavekkhitā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:402_4: Na dhammakusaloti ācariyamukhato anuggahitattā pāḷiyaṃ na kusalo,
atk-vin02a4:402_7: Na byañjanakusaloti sithiladhanitādivasena parimaṇḍalabyañjanāropane kusalo na hoti;
atk-vin02a4:402_9: Na pubbāparakusaloti atthapubbāpare dhammapubbāpare niruttipubbāpare byañjanapubbāpare purekathāpacchākathāsu ca na kusalo hoti.
atk-vin02a4:403_0: Kodhanotiādīni yasmā kodhādīhi abhibhūto kāraṇākāraṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-vin02a4:403_3: Pasāretā hoti no sāretāti mohetā hoti,
atk-vin02a4:403_5: codakacuditakānaṃ kathaṃ moheti pidahati na sāretīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:406_3: ayaṃ me ācariyo”tiādīni cintetvā tassa jayaṃ ākaṅkhamāno “adhammaṃ dhammo”ti dīpeti.
atk-vin02a4:406_4: Saṅghagaru hotīti dhammañca vinayañca amuñcitvā vinicchinanto saṅghagaruko nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:406_5: Cīvarādīni gahetvā vinicchinanto āmisagaruko nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:406_6: tāni aggahetvā yathādhammaṃ vinicchinanto saddhammagaruko nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:407_1: Pañcahupāli ākārehīti pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅgho bhijjati – kammena, uddesena,
atk-vin02a4:407_5: Ettha kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena.
atk-vin02a4:407_8: tāhi tāhi upapattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni dīpento.
atk-vin02a4:407_9: Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
atk-vin02a4:407_10: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthu sāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:407_12: kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
atk-vin02a4:407_13: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-vin02a4:408_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:408_2: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharante tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho.
atk-vin02a4:408_3: Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atireke vā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karoti,
atk-vin02a4:408_5: Iti yaṃ saṅghabhedakakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ avocumhā “evaṃ aṭṭhārasasu vatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena ‘imaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-vin02a4:408_6: imaṃ rocethā’ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate saṅgho bhinno hoti.
atk-vin02a4:408_9: Tassa iminā idha vuttena saṅghabhedalakkhaṇena atthato nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-vin02a4:409_3: Tatra hi cuddasa khandhakavattāni paññattāni. Tenāha –
atk-vin02a4:409_7: no ca saṅghabhedoti ettāvatā hi saṅgharājimattameva hoti,
atk-vin02a4:409_9: anupubbena pana ayaṃ saṅgharāji vaḍḍhamānā saṅghabhedāya saṃvattatīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:409_13: Kammākammāni karontīti aparāparaṃ saṅghakammaṃ upādāya khuddakāni ceva mahantāni ca kammāni karonti.
atk-vin02a4:411_2: vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ kammenāti tesu adhammādīsu adhammādayo eteti evaṃdiṭṭhikova hutvā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya
atk-vin02a4:411_3: te dhammādivasena dīpetvā visuṃ kammaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:411_4: Iti yaṃ vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:411_5: tena evaṃ katena vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ kammena saddhiṃ pañcaṅgāni honti,
atk-vin02a4:411_6: “imehi kho upāli pañcahaṅgehī”ti ayamekasmiṃ pañcake atthayojanā.
atk-vin02a4:411_8: Etthāpi ca vohārādi aṅgattayaṃ pubbabhāgavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:411_11: Na hettha kiñci atthi yaṃ pubbe avuttanayaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:413_0: 461. Āvāsikavagge – yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā āharitvā ṭhapito.
atk-vin02a4:416_6: Ekāvattoti ekato āvatto sapattapakkhe ṭhito verī visabhāgapuggalo vuccati;
atk-vin02a4:417_5: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca vuttesu avandiyesu naggañca ukkhittakañca vandantasseva āpatti.
atk-vin02a4:417_6: Itaresaṃ pana asāruppaṭṭhena ca antarā vuttakāraṇena ca vandanā paṭikkhittā.
atk-vin02a4:417_7: Ito paraṃ pacchāupasampannādayo dasapi āpattivatthubhāveneva avandiyā.
atk-vin02a4:417_9: Iti imesu pañcasu pañcakesu terasa jane vandantassa anāpatti,
atk-vin02a4:418_1: Ācariyo vandiyoti pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo uddesācariyo ovādācariyoti ayaṃ pañcavidhopi ācariyo vandiyo.
atk-vin02a4:422_1: Acittako āpajjatītiādīsu sahaseyyādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ asañcicca āpajjanto acittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:422_5: Pubbe vuttameva tiṇavatthārakena vuṭṭhahanto acittako āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:422_10: “buddhānaṃ anusāsaniṃ karomī”ti udaggacitto desento kusalacitto vuṭṭhāti.
atk-vin02a4:422_13: Bhiṃsāpanādīni katvā “buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ karomī”ti somanassiko desento akusalacitto āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:423_0: Paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādi pubbe vuttanayattā uttānameva.
atk-vin02a4:424_1: Cattāro pārājikā katihi samuṭṭhānehītiādīsu ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato yaṃ yaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassa yassa labbhati,
atk-vin02a4:428_1: “Kati āpattiyo kāyikā”tiādigāthānaṃ vissajjane cha āpattiyo kāyikāti antarapeyyāle catutthena āpattisamuṭṭhānena cha āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:428_4: Kāyadvāre samuṭṭhitattā hi etā kāyikāti vuccanti.
atk-vin02a4:428_5: Cha vācasikāti tasmiṃyeva antarapeyyāle pañcamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena cha āpattiyo āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:429_5: yo chādeti so dukkaṭaṃ desāpetabbo”ti imā aruṇugge tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:429_7: paññattivasena pana dve honti bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyakā bhikkhunīnaṃ yāvatatiyakāti.
atk-vin02a4:429_8: Ekettha aṭṭhavatthukāti bhikkhunīnaṃyeva ekā ettha imasmiṃ sāsane aṭṭhavatthukā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:429_10: so āvikareyyā”ti iminā ekena nidānuddesena sabbasikkhāpadānañca sabbapātimokkhuddesānañca saṅgaho hoti.
atk-vin02a4:430_0: Vinayassa dve mūlānīti kāyo ceva vācā ca.
atk-vin02a4:430_2: Dve duṭṭhullacchādanāti vajjapaṭicchādikāya pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ paṭicchādakassa pācittiyanti imā dve duṭṭhullacchādanāpattiyo nāma.
atk-vin02a4:431_0: Gāmantare catassoti “bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidahati, dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:431_3: bhikkhuniyā gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā parikkhitte gāme paṭhamapāde thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:431_6: dutiyapāde saṅghādiseso”ti imā gāmantare dukkaṭapācittiyathullaccayasaṅghaādisesavasena catasso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:431_7: Catasso nadipārapaccayāti “bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidahati, dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:431_10: bhikkhuniyā nadipāraṃ gacchantiyā uttaraṇakāle paṭhamapāde thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:432_0: Dve vācasikā rattinti bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati,
atk-vin02a4:432_3: Dve vācasikā divāti bhikkhunī divā paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati,
atk-vin02a4:432_6: Dadamānassa tissoti maraṇādhippāyo manussassa visaṃ deti,
atk-vin02a4:432_15: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaradāne pācittiyanti evaṃ dadamānassa tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:432_20: avassutāya avassutassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiggaṇhantiyā thullaccayaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:435_4: Ayameva hi eko dhaññaraso vikāle vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:435_6: Ayameva hi ekā ñatticatutthakammena sammuti anuññātā.
atk-vin02a4:436_0: Pārājikā kāyikā dveti bhikkhūnaṃ methunapārājikaṃ bhikkhunīnañca kāyasaṃsaggapārājikaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:436_1: Dve saṃvāsabhūmiyoti attanā vā attānaṃ samānasaṃvāsakaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:436_3: Kurundiyaṃ pana “samānasaṃvāsakabhūmi ca nānāsaṃvāsakabhūmi cā”ti evaṃ dve saṃvāsabhūmiyo vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:436_4: Dvinnaṃ ratticchedoti pārivāsikassa ca mānattacārikassa ca paññattā.
atk-vin02a4:437_0: Dve attānaṃ vadhitvānāti bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā dve āpattiyo āpajjati;
atk-vin02a4:437_5: Dvīhi saṅgho bhijjatīti kammena ca salākaggāhena ca.
atk-vin02a4:437_6: Dvettha paṭhamāpattikāti ettha sakalepi vinaye dve paṭhamāpattikā ubhinnaṃ paññattivasena.
atk-vin02a4:437_7: Itarathā pana nava bhikkhūnaṃ nava bhikkhunīnanti aṭṭhārasa honti.
atk-vin02a4:438_4: tiracchānagatassa maraṇe pācittiya”nti imā tisso honti.
atk-vin02a4:438_5: Vācā pārājikā tayoti vajjapaṭicchādikāya ukkhittānuvattikāya aṭṭhavatthukāyāti.
atk-vin02a4:438_9: Obhāsanā tayoti vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhāsane saṅghādiseso,
atk-vin02a4:438_10: vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇane thullaccayaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:438_12: Sañcarittena vā tayoti paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati paccāharati,
atk-vin02a4:438_17: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ime sañcarittena kāraṇabhūtena tayo āpattikkhandhā honti.
atk-vin02a4:439_0: Tayo puggalā na upasampādetabbāti addhānahīno aṅgahīno vatthuvipanno ca tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a4:439_4: Mātughātakādayo ca karaṇadukkaṭakā paṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakatiracchānagatasaṅkhātena vatthuvipanneneva saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:439_11: “dinnaṃ kata”ntiādibhedaṃ atītakaraṇaṃ nāmāti imehi tīhi kammāni saṅgayhanti.
atk-vin02a4:439_12: Aparehipi tīhi kammāni saṅgayhanti – vatthunā, ñattiyā,
atk-vin02a4:439_14: Vatthusampannañhi ñattisampannaṃ anussāvanasampannañca kammaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-vin02a4:439_16: Nāsitakā tayo nāma mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsetha,
atk-vin02a4:439_19: kaṇṭakaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ nāsethāti evaṃ liṅgasaṃvāsadaṇḍakammanāsanāvasena tayo nāsitakā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:439_20: Tiṇṇannaṃ ekavācikāti “anujānāmi bhikkhave dve tayo ekānussāvane kātu”nti vacanato tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ ekupajjhāyena nānācariyena ekānussāvanā vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:440_0: Adinnādāne tissoti pāde vā atirekapāde vā pārājikaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:441_0: Pācittiyena dukkaṭā katāti bhikkhunovādakavaggasmiṃ dasasu sikkhāpadesu pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭā katā evāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:441_1: Caturettha navakā vuttāti paṭhamasikkhāpadamhiyeva adhammakamme dve,
atk-vin02a4:441_2: dhammakamme dveti evaṃ cattāro navakā vuttāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:441_3: Dvinnaṃ cīvarena cāti bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:441_4: bhikkhunīnaṃ santike upasampannāya dentassa dukkaṭanti evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ cīvaraṃ dentassa cīvarena kāraṇabhūtena āpatti hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:442_1: Bhuñjantāmakadhaññena pācittiyena dukkaṭā katāti āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭā katāyeva.
atk-vin02a4:443_0: Gacchantassa catassoti bhikkhuniyā vā mātugāmena vā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:443_4: dutiyapāde saṅghādisesoti gacchantassa imā catasso āpattiyo honti.
atk-vin02a4:443_5: Ṭhitassa cāpi tattakāti ṭhitassapi catasso evāti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a4:443_6: Bhikkhunī andhakāre vā paṭicchanne vā okāse mittasanthavavasena purisassa hatthapāse tiṭṭhati,
atk-vin02a4:443_13: Nipannassāpi tattakāti sacepi hi sā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā,
atk-vin02a4:445_1: Pañca pācittiyānīti pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā nānābhājanesu vā ekabhājane vā amissetvā ṭhapitāni honti,
atk-vin02a4:445_2: sattāhātikkame so bhikkhu pañca pācittiyāni sabbāni nānāvatthukāni ekakkhaṇe āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:446_0: Nava pācittiyānīti yo bhikkhu nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā tehi saddhiṃ ekato ekaṃ kabaḷaṃ omadditvā mukhe pakkhipitvā paragaḷaṃ atikkāmeti,
atk-vin02a4:446_1: ayaṃ nava pācittiyāni sabbāni nānāvatthukāni ekakkhaṇe āpajjati “imaṃ paṭhamaṃ āpanno,
atk-vin02a4:446_4: pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmetvā pañca āpattiyo āpanno,
atk-vin02a4:446_5: tā tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ ekavācāya deseyya,
atk-vin02a4:446_7: dvīhi tīhi vācāhi kiccaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a4:446_9: nava paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhuñjitvā nava āpattiyo āpanno,
atk-vin02a4:447_2: yathāvatthukaṃ taṃ tumhamūle paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā deseyya,
atk-vin02a4:448_0: Yāvatatiyake tissoti ukkhittānuvattikāya pārājikaṃ bhedakānuvattakānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:448_1: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge caṇḍakāḷikāya ca bhikkhuniyā pācittiyanti imā yāvatatiyakā tisso āpattiyo.
atk-vin02a4:448_2: Cha vohārapaccayāti payuttavācāpaccayā cha āpattiyo āpajjatīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-vin02a4:448_3: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
atk-vin02a4:448_7: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā yo te vihāre vasati so arahāti vadati,
atk-vin02a4:448_9: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-vin02a4:448_11: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-vin02a4:448_13: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-vin02a4:449_3: Pañca bhojanapaccayāti avassutā avassutassa purisassa hatthato bhojanaṃ gahetvā tattheva manussamaṃsaṃ
atk-vin02a4:449_4: lasuṇaṃ attano atthāya viññāpetvā gahitapaṇītabhojanāni avasesañca akappiyamaṃsaṃ pakkhipitvā vomissakaṃ
atk-vin02a4:449_9: dukkaṭanti imā pañca āpattiyo bhojanapaccayā āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:450_0: Pañca ṭhānānīti “ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:450_4: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge pācittiya”nti evaṃ sabbā yāvatatiyakā pañca ṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-vin02a4:450_5: Pañcannañceva āpattīti āpatti nāma pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:450_8: Iminā pariyāyena tesaṃ āpatti na desāpetabbā,
atk-vin02a4:450_10: Pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇena cāti adhikaraṇañca pañcannamevāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:450_11: Etesaṃyeva hi pañcannaṃ pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya vinicchayavohāro adhikaraṇanti vuccati,
atk-vin02a4:451_0: Pañcannaṃ vinicchayo hotīti pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃyeva vinicchayo nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:451_1: Pañcannaṃ vūpasamena cāti etesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:451_2: Pañcannañceva anāpattīti etesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ anāpatti nāma hotīti attho.
atk-vin02a4:451_3: Tīhi ṭhānehi sobhatīti saṅghādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi sobhati.
atk-vin02a4:451_4: Katavītikkamo hi puggalo sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalasantike vā paṭikaritvā abbhuṇhasīlo pākatiko hoti,
atk-vin02a4:452_0: Dve kāyikā rattinti bhikkhunī rattandhakāre purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānanisajjasayanāni kappayamānā pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:452_1: hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhānādīni kappayamānā dukkaṭanti dve kāyadvārasambhavā āpattiyo rattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:452_2: Dve kāyikā divāti eteneva upāyena divā paṭicchanne okāse dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:452_11: antamaso yāguṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā dentassa sāmaṇerassāpi hi mukhaṃ ullokayato dukkaṭameva.
atk-vin02a4:452_12: Kurundiyaṃ pana “ekā piṇḍapātapaccayāti bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:453_1: Ukkhittakā tayo vuttāti āpattiyā adassane appaṭikamme pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissaggeti.
atk-vin02a4:453_2: Tecattālīsa sammāvattanāti tesaṃyeva ukkhittakānaṃ ettakesu vattesu vattanā.
atk-vin02a4:454_1: Cuddasa paramanti vuccatīti dasāhaparamādinayena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:454_2: Dvādasa pāṭidesanīyāti bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭha.
atk-vin02a4:454_3: Catunnaṃ desanāya cāti catunnaṃ accayadesanāyāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:454_8: vāsabhagāmiyattherassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ accayadesanāti ayaṃ catunnaṃ accayadesanā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:455_0: Aṭṭhaṅgiko musāvādoti “pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissa”nti ādiṃ katvā “vinidhāya sañña”nti pariyosānehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi aṭṭhaṅgiko.
atk-vin02a4:455_1: Uposathaṅgānipi pāṇaṃ na hanetiādinā nayena vuttāneva.
atk-vin02a4:455_4: bhikkhu sotā ca hoti sāvetā cā”tiādinā nayena saṅghabhedake vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:456_0: Aṭṭhavācikā upasampadāti bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:456_1: Aṭṭhannaṃ paccuṭṭhātabbanti bhattagge aṭṭhannaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ itarāhi paccuṭṭhāya āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:456_2: Bhikkhunovādako aṭṭhahīti aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammannitabbo.
atk-vin02a4:457_0: Ekassa chejjanti gāthāya navasu janesu yo salākaṃ gāhetvā saṅghaṃ bhindati,
atk-vin02a4:457_5: Imā pana āpattiyo ca anāpattiyo ca sabbesaṃ ekavatthukā saṅghabhedavatthukā eva.
atk-vin02a4:458_0: Nava āghātavatthūnīti gāthāya navahīti navahi bhikkhūhi saṅgho bhijjati.
atk-vin02a4:458_1: Ñattiyā karaṇā navāti ñattiyā kātabbāni kammāni navāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:460_1: Dasa puggalā nābhivādetabbāti senāsanakkhandhake vuttā dasa janā.
atk-vin02a4:460_2: Añjali sāmīcena cāti sāmīcikammena saddhiṃ añjali ca tesaṃ na kātabbo,
atk-vin02a4:460_5: Dasannaṃ dukkaṭanti tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ evaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:460_6: Dasa cīvaradhāraṇāti dasa divasāni atirekacīvarassa dhāraṇā anuññātāti attho.
atk-vin02a4:461_1: dātabbaṃ idha cīvaranti pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ sammukhāva dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:461_2: Sattannaṃ santeti disāpakkantaummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ tiṇṇañca ukkhittakānanti imesaṃ sattannaṃ sante patirūpe gāhake parammukhāpi dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:461_3: Soḷasannaṃ na dātabbanti sesānaṃ cīvarakkhandhake vuttānaṃ paṇḍakādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ na dātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:462_1: āpattiyo chādayitvānāti katisataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvāna.
atk-vin02a4:462_3: āpattiyo chādayitvānāti dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādayitvāna.
atk-vin02a4:462_5: yo divase sataṃ sataṃ saṅghādisesāpattiyo āpajjitvā dasa dasa divase paṭicchādeti,
atk-vin02a4:462_7: so sabbāva tā āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti parivāsaṃ yācitvā dasa rattiyo vasitvāna mucceyya pārivāsikoti.
atk-vin02a4:463_3: tathā ñattikammañattidutiyakammañatticatutthakammānipīti evaṃ ekekasmiṃ kamme tayo tayo katvā dvādasa kammadosā vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:464_1: tathā sesānipīti evaṃ catasso kammasampattiyo vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:465_6: Ekettha dhammikā katāti ekaṃ dhammena samaggakammamevettha dhammikaṃ katanti attho.
atk-vin02a4:466_0: Yaṃ desitāti yāni desitāni vuttāni pakāsitāni.
atk-vin02a4:466_2: taṃ bhagavatā raññā sapattagaṇaṃ abhimadditvā rajjaṃ viya kilesagaṇaṃ abhimadditvā jitaṃ vijitaṃ adhigataṃ sampattaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:466_6: tena anantajinena tādinā vivekadassinā yāni āpattikkhandhāni desitāni vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:466_7: Ekettha sammati vinā samathehīti ayamettha padasambandho,
atk-vin02a4:466_9: tattha ekāpi āpatti vinā samathehi na sammati,
atk-vin02a4:466_10: atha kho cha samathā cattāri adhikaraṇānīti sabbepime dhammā sammukhāvinayena sammanti,
atk-vin02a4:466_12: Ettha pana eko sammukhāvinayova vinā samathehi sammati,
atk-vin02a4:466_14: Na hi tassa aññena samathena vinā anipphatti nāma atthi.
atk-vin02a4:466_17: Iminā tāva adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāsu attho vutto.
atk-vin02a4:466_18: Mayaṃ pana “vinā”ti nipātassa paṭisedhanamattamatthaṃ gahetvā “ekettha sammati vinā samathehī”ti etesu
atk-vin02a4:466_19: sattasu āpattikkhandhesu eko pārājikāpattikkhandho vinā samathehi sammatīti etamatthaṃ roceyyāma.
atk-vin02a4:466_21: sā āpatti na katamena adhikaraṇena katamamhi ṭhāne na katamena samathena sammatī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:467_9: tasmiṃ vematiko bhede vematiko”ti evaṃ yāni aṭṭhārasannaṃ bhedakaravatthūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhakāni saṅghabhedakakkhandhake vuttāni,
atk-vin02a4:468_2: tasmiṃ dhammadiṭṭhi bhede dhammadiṭṭhi avinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ avinidhāya khantiṃ avinidhāya ruciṃ avinidhāya bhāvaṃ anussāveti,
atk-vin02a4:468_9: saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko na nerayiko na kappaṭṭho na atekiccho”ti evaṃ ekekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekekaṃ katvā
atk-vin02a4:474_2: Sambhogo ekacco tahiṃ na labbhatīti akappiyasambhogo na labbhati,
atk-vin02a4:474_5: Pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitāti esā pañhā kusalehi paṇḍitehi cintitā.
atk-vin02a4:475_0: Avissajjitagāthā garubhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttā, attho panassā garubhaṇḍavinicchaye vuttoyeva.
atk-vin02a4:476_0: Dasa puggale na vadāmīti senāsanakkhandhake vutte dasa puggale na vadāmi.
atk-vin02a4:476_1: Ekādasa vivajjiyāti ye mahākhandhake ekādasa vivajjanīyapuggalā vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:476_3: Ayaṃ pañhā naggaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:477_0: Kathaṃ nu sikkhāya asādhāraṇoti pañhā nahāpitapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:478_0: Taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhāti ayaṃ pañhā nimmitabuddhaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:479_1: Ayaṃ pañhā yaṃ taṃ asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:479_2: yassa ure akkhīni ceva mukhañca hoti,
atk-vin02a4:480_0: Bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭinti ayaṃ pañhā tiṇacchādanaṃ kuṭiṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:481_0: Āpajjeyya garukaṃ chejjavatthunti ayaṃ pañhā vajjapaṭicchādikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:481_2: Ekādasapi hi te gihibhāveyeva pārājikaṃ pattā.
atk-vin02a4:482_1: Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyāti “iti ime sossantī”ti parapuggale sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya.
atk-vin02a4:482_3: sampajānamusāvādassa hotī”ti imaṃ musāvādaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:482_4: Tassa hi bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisinnassa manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a4:482_6: tenassa vacīdvāre akiriyato ayaṃ āpatti samuṭṭhātīti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:483_0: Saṅghādisesā caturoti ayaṃ pañhā aruṇugge gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkantabhikkhuniṃ sandhāya vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:483_1: sā hi sakagāmato paccūsasamaye nikkhamitvā aruṇuggamanakāle vuttappakāraṃ nadipāraṃ okkantamattāva rattivippavāsagāmantaranadipāragaṇamhāohīyanalakkhaṇena
atk-vin02a4:484_0: Siyā āpattiyo nānāti ayaṃ pañhā ekatoupasampannā dve bhikkhuniyo sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:484_1: Tāsu hi bhikkhūnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannāya hatthato gaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:484_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ santike ekatoupasampannāya hatthato gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:485_0: Caturo janā saṃvidhāyāti ācariyo ca tayo ca antevāsikā chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avahariṃsu,
atk-vin02a4:487_0: 480. Chiddaṃ tasmiṃ ghare natthīti ayaṃ pañhā dussakuṭiādīni santhatapeyyālañca sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:488_0: Telaṃ madhuṃ phāṇitanti gāthā liṅgaparivattaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:489_1: Yo hi saṅghassa pariṇatalābhato ekaṃ cīvaraṃ attano,
atk-vin02a4:490_0: Kammañca taṃ kuppeyya vaggapaccayāti ayaṃ pañhā dvādasayojanapamāṇesu bārāṇasiādīsu nagaresu gāmasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:491_0: Padavītihāramattenāti gāthā sañcarittaṃ sandhāya vuttā, atthopi cassā sañcarittavaṇṇanāyameva vutto.
atk-vin02a4:492_0: Sabbāni tāni nissaggiyānīti ayaṃ pañhā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:492_1: Sace hi tiṇṇampi cīvarānaṃ kākaūhadanaṃ vā kaddamamakkhitaṃ vā kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā bhikkhunī udakena dhovati,
atk-vin02a4:493_0: Saraṇagamanampi na tassa atthīti saraṇagamanaupasampadāpi natthi.
atk-vin02a4:493_1: Ayaṃ pana pañhā mahāpajāpatiyā upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:494_0: Haneyya anariyaṃ mandoti tañhi itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā anariyaṃ haneyya.
atk-vin02a4:494_1: Ayaṃ pañhā liṅgaparivattena itthibhūtaṃ pitaraṃ purisabhūtañca mātaraṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:495_0: Na tenānantaraṃ phuseti ayaṃ pañhā migasiṅgatāpasasīhakumārādīnaṃ viya tiracchānamātāpitaro sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:496_1: Codayitvāti gāthā paṇḍakādīnaṃ upasampadaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:496_3: dutiyā anāpattikassa kammaṃ sandhāya vuttā”ti āgataṃ.
atk-vin02a4:497_3: Chindantassa anāpattīti kese ca nakhe ca chindantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a4:497_4: Chādentassa āpattīti attano āpattiṃ chādentassa aññesaṃ vā āpattiṃ.
atk-vin02a4:498_0: Saccaṃ bhaṇantoti gāthāya “sikharaṇīsi ubhatobyañjanāsī”ti saccaṃ bhaṇanto garukaṃ āpajjati,
atk-vin02a4:498_1: sampajānamusāvāde pana musā bhāsato lahukāpatti hoti,
atk-vin02a4:500_0: 481. Adhiṭṭhitanti gāthā nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:501_0: Atthaṅgate sūriyeti gāthā romanthakaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:502_4: saṅghabhedako pana na rattacitto na ca pana theyyacitto na cāpi so paraṃ maraṇāya cetayi,
atk-vin02a4:503_0: Gaccheyya aḍḍhayojananti ayaṃ pañhā suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ ekakulassa rukkhamūlaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:504_0: Kāyikānīti ayaṃ gāthā sambahulānaṃ itthīnaṃ kese vā aṅguliyo vā ekato gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:505_0: Vācasikānīti ayaṃ gāthā “sabbā tumhe sikharaṇiyo”tiādinā nayena duṭṭhullabhāṇiṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:506_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti tisso itthiyo vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:506_3: Tayo puriseti tayo purisepi upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati.
atk-vin02a4:506_4: Tayo anariyapaṇḍaketi ubhatobyañjanasaṅkhāte tayo anariye tayo ca paṇḍaketi imepi cha jane upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati.
atk-vin02a4:506_5: Na cācare methunaṃ byañjanasminti anulomapārājikavasenapi methunaṃ nācarati.
atk-vin02a4:506_6: Chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayāti siyā methunadhammapaccayā pārājikanti.
atk-vin02a4:506_8: tassā hi methunadhammassa pubbabhāgaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpajjituṃ vāyamantiyā methunadhammapaccayā chejjaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:507_0: Mātaraṃ cīvaranti ayaṃ gāthā piṭṭhisamaye vassikasāṭikatthaṃ satuppādakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:508_0: Kuddho ārādhako hotīti gāthā titthiyavattaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:508_1: Titthiyo hi vattaṃ pūrayamāno titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kuddho ārādhako hoti,
atk-vin02a4:508_2: vatthuttayassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kuddho gārayho hotīti tatthevassā vitthāro vutto.
atk-vin02a4:509_0: Saṅghādisesantiādi gāthā yā bhikkhunī avassutāva avassutassa purisassa hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā manussamaṃsalasuṇapaṇītabhojanasesaakappiyamaṃsehi
atk-vin02a4:510_0: Eko upasampanno eko anupasampannoti gāthā ākāsagataṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:510_1: Sace hi dvīsu sāmaṇeresu eko iddhiyā kesaggamattampi pathaviṃ muñcitvā nisinno hoti,
atk-vin02a4:510_3: Saṅghenāpi ākāse nisīditvā bhūmigatassa kammaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:511_0: Akappakatanti gāthā acchinnacīvarakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:511_1: Tasmiṃyeva cassā sikkhāpade vitthārena vinicchayopi vutto.
atk-vin02a4:512_0: Na deti na paṭiggaṇhātīti nāpi uyyojikā deti,
atk-vin02a4:512_2: Paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva kāraṇena uyyojikāya hatthato uyyojitāya paṭiggaho na vijjati.
atk-vin02a4:512_3: Āpajjati garukanti evaṃ santepi avassutassa hatthato piṇḍapātaggahaṇe uyyojentī saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:512_4: Tañca paribhogapaccayāti tañca pana āpattiṃ āpajjamānā tassā uyyojitāya paribhogapaccayā āpajjati.
atk-vin02a4:512_5: Tassā hi bhojanapariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅghādiseso hotīti.
atk-vin02a4:512_6: Dutiyagāthā tassāyeva udakadantaponaggahaṇe uyyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:513_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjanti sattarasakesu hi aññataraṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā anādariyena chādayamānāpi
atk-vin02a4:513_3: paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā āpattiyā pakkhamānattameva labhati.
atk-vin02a4:513_5: sāvasesañca garukaṃ āpajjitvā chādetvā vajjaṃ na phusati.
atk-vin02a4:513_6: Pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitāti ayaṃ kira pañhā ukkhittakabhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-vin02a4:513_8: tasmā so saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjitvā chādento vajjaṃ na phusatīti.
atk-vin02a4:517_1: Kammavagge catunnaṃ kammānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ samathakkhandhake vuttameva.
atk-vin02a4:517_3: atha kho ayaṃ kammavinicchayo nāma ādito paṭṭhāya vuccamāno pākaṭo hoti,
atk-vin02a4:517_7: Apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:517_8: Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:517_9: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti
atk-vin02a4:517_11: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti
atk-vin02a4:517_12: evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:519_5: vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha kammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin02a4:519_7: Avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhakamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo cāti etāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti,
atk-vin02a4:519_14: Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti,
atk-vin02a4:520_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:521_2: vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammanti ettha atthi kammaṃ sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:521_11: appasādanīyaṃ dassentassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbaṃ avandanīyakammanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti,
atk-vin02a4:521_12: taṃ sabbaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:521_13: Idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kammaṃ asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hoti akuppaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:522_4: puggalasammukhatāti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ sammukhāvinayaṃ upanetvāva kātabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:522_6: Evaṃ akatāni panetāni imaṃ sammukhāvinayasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā vatthuvipannāni nāma honti.
atk-vin02a4:523_1: taṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā tesampi vatthuvipannatā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:523_3: Paṭipucchā karaṇīyaṃ appaṭipucchā karotīti pucchitvā codetvā sāretvā kātabbaṃ apucchitvā acodetvā asāretvā karoti.
atk-vin02a4:523_4: Paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭiññāya karotīti paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathādinnāya paṭiññāya kātabbaṃ appaṭiññāya karontassa vippalapantassa balakkārena karoti.
atk-vin02a4:524_0: Anuposathe uposathaṃ karotīti anuposathadivase uposathaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:524_1: Uposathadivaso nāma ṭhapetvā kattikamāsaṃ avasesesu ekādasasu māsesu bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca yathāvuttacātuddasapannarasā ca.
atk-vin02a4:524_2: Etaṃ tippakārampi uposathadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase uposathaṃ karonto anuposathe uposathaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:524_3: Yatra hi pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
atk-vin02a4:524_4: tattha tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātāmhā”ti antarā sāmaggiuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti,
atk-vin02a4:524_5: karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a4:525_1: pavāraṇādivaso nāma ekasmiṃ kattikamāse bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso ca dve ca puṇṇamāsiyo.
atk-vin02a4:525_2: Evaṃ catubbidhampi pavāraṇādivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase pavārento apavāraṇāya pavāreti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:525_3: Idhāpi appamattakassa vivādassa vūpasame sāmaggipavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti,
atk-vin02a4:525_5: Apica ūnavīsativassaṃ vā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannapubbaṃ vā ekādasasu vā abhabbapuggalesu aññataraṃ upasampādentassapi
atk-vin02a4:526_1: Ñattito vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuṃ na parāmasatīti yassa upasampadādikammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:526_5: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho,
atk-vin02a4:527_0: Saṅghaṃ na parāmasatīti saṅghassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a4:528_0: Puggalaṃ na parāmasatīti yo upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhāyo,
atk-vin02a4:528_4: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me,
atk-vin02a4:529_0: Ñattiṃ na parāmasatīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati.
atk-vin02a4:529_1: Ñattidutiyakamme ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvikkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti.
atk-vin02a4:529_2: Ñatticatutthakammepi ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā catukkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti;
atk-vin02a4:530_0: Pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetīti paṭhamaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanakammaṃ katvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati saṅghassa
atk-vin02a4:530_3: Iti imehi pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:531_1: Anussāvanato vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:531_3: “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”ti paṭhamānussāvane “dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi,
atk-vin02a4:531_5: suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”ti dutiyatatiyānussāvanāsu vā “ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa
atk-vin02a4:531_7: āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vadanto vatthuṃ na parāmasati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:531_10: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vadanto saṅghaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:531_12: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me bhante saṅgho,
atk-vin02a4:531_13: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti vadanto puggalaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
atk-vin02a4:532_0: Sāvanaṃ hāpetīti sabbena sabbaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ na karoti,
atk-vin02a4:532_4: Yopi ñattidutiyakamme ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ekaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāvento akkharaṃ vā chaḍḍeti,
atk-vin02a4:532_7: Ñatticatutthakamme pana ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā sakimeva vā dvikkhattuṃ vā kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ karontopi
atk-vin02a4:532_8: akkharaṃ vā padaṃ vā chaḍḍentopi duruttaṃ karontopi anussāvanaṃ hāpetiyevāti veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:533_0: Duruttaṃ karotīti ettha pana ayaṃ vinicchayo –
atk-vin02a4:533_1: yo hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati,
atk-vin02a4:535_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti.
atk-vin02a4:536_2: Ettha hi “sithilaṃ” nāma pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:536_7: Yaṃ vā āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa nakkhamatīti evaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:536_9: Yaṃ vā āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassa yassa na khamatīti evaṃ asaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:536_10: “Niggahita”nti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:536_11: “Sambandha”nti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhissā”ti vā “tuṇhassā”ti vā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:536_12: “Vavatthita”nti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti vā “tuṇha assā”ti vā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:536_13: “Vimutta”nti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ akatvā vuccati.
atk-vin02a4:537_2: kāraṃ katvā “suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithilassa dhanitakaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:537_8: kāre katvā “bante saṅgo”ti vacanaṃ dhanitassa sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:537_9: “Suṇātu me”ti vivaṭena mukhena vattabbe pana “suṇaṃtu me”ti vā “esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “esaṃ ñattī”ti
atk-vin02a4:537_10: vā avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vacanaṃ vimuttassa niggahitavacanaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:537_11: “Pattakalla”nti avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ
atk-vin02a4:538_3: niggahite kattabbe vimuttanti imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
atk-vin02a4:538_4: Evaṃ vadanto hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati,
atk-vin02a4:538_6: Itaresu pana dīgharassādīsu chasu byañjanesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghameva,
atk-vin02a4:538_7: rassaṭṭhāne ca rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsentena kammavācā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a4:538_8: Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:538_15: Imāni hi cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
atk-vin02a4:539_10: Tasmā vinayadharena neva da- kāro ta-
atk-vin02a4:539_11: kāro kātabbo…pe… na ka- kāro ya- kāro.
atk-vin02a4:539_12: Yathāpāḷiyā niruttiṃ sodhetvā dasavidhāya byañjananiruttiyā vuttadose pariharantena kammavācā kātabbā.
atk-vin02a4:540_0: Akāle vā sāvetīti sāvanāya akāle anokāse ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃyeva anussāvanakammaṃ katvā pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-vin02a4:540_1: Iti imehi pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti.
atk-vin02a4:541_1: Sīmato vipattiyaṃ pana atikhuddakasīmā nāma yā ekavīsati bhikkhū na gaṇhāti.
atk-vin02a4:541_2: Kurundiyaṃ pana “yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:541_8: Ettha pana atimahatī nāma yā kesaggamattenāpi tiyojanaṃ atikkāmetvā sammatā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:541_10: Puratthimāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā puna
atk-vin02a4:541_11: puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikittetvāva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati;
atk-vin02a4:541_13: Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti,
atk-vin02a4:541_15: Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjavālikāpuñjānaṃ vā
atk-vin02a4:541_16: aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:541_17: Chāyānimittā nāma yā pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃkiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:541_18: Animittā nāma yā sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā hoti.
atk-vin02a4:542_0: Bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhito sammannati.
atk-vin02a4:542_1: Nadiyā samudde jātassare sīmaṃ sammannatīti etesu nadiādīsu yaṃ sammannati,
atk-vin02a4:542_6: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti.
atk-vin02a4:542_7: Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindati.
atk-vin02a4:542_8: Ajjhottharatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharati.
atk-vin02a4:542_9: Tattha yathā sambhedo ca ajjhottharaṇañca hoti,
atk-vin02a4:542_11: Iti imā ekādasapi sīmā asīmā gāmakhettasadisā eva,
atk-vin02a4:542_13: Tena vuttaṃ “imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti.
atk-vin02a4:543_1: Parisato kammavipattiyaṃ pana kiñci anuttānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-vin02a4:543_3: tampi parato “cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā”tiādinā nayena vuttameva.
atk-vin02a4:543_4: Tattha pakatattā kammappattāti catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro pakatattā anukkhittā anissāritā parisuddhasīlā
atk-vin02a4:543_5: cattāro bhikkhū kammappattā kammassa arahā anucchavikā sāmino.
atk-vin02a4:543_6: Na tehi vinā taṃ kammaṃ kayirati,
atk-vin02a4:543_7: na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā eti.
atk-vin02a4:543_11: Chandapārisuddhiṃ datvā āgacchantu vā mā vā,
atk-vin02a4:543_16: Apica yasmā taṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ katvā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:544_1: Puna cattāri kammānītiādiko nayo paṇḍakādīnaṃ avatthubhāvadassanatthaṃ vutto.
atk-vin02a4:546_1: Idāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ “apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:546_6: kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcama”nti ettha “osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇa”nti padasiliṭṭhatāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:546_11: Tasmā etarahi sacepi sāmaṇero buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-vin02a4:546_14: so yāvatatiyaṃ nivāretvā taṃ laddhiṃ nissajjāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:547_2: ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko,
atk-vin02a4:548_2: svāhaṃ saṅghaṃ khamāpemī”ti khamāpento yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā apalokanakammeneva osāretabbo.
atk-vin02a4:548_4: saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:549_2: ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko,
atk-vin02a4:549_6: svāyaṃ idāni sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito katadaṇḍakammo accayaṃ deseti,
atk-vin02a4:549_7: imassa sāmaṇerassa yathā pure kāyasambhogasāmaggidānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:550_6: bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento vambhento viharati,
atk-vin02a4:550_9: saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:552_0: Tassa aparena samayena sammā vattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:553_2: so bhikkhu sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito,
atk-vin02a4:553_3: paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhati, saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi,
atk-vin02a4:554_0: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ vatvā apalokanakammeneva brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabboti.
atk-vin02a4:555_0: Kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunikkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti,
atk-vin02a4:555_8: Imesu vatthūsu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā ‘anujānāmi bhikkhave tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātu’nti.
atk-vin02a4:555_12: ‘avandiyo so bhikkhave bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”’ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ anuññātaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:555_13: taṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-vin02a4:555_18: Apica naṃ paṭippassaddhiyā saddhiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ idhāpi vadāma,
atk-vin02a4:555_19: bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:556_0: “Ayye asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dasseti,
atk-vin02a4:556_1: etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmi,
atk-vin02a4:557_0: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammena avandiyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:558_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so bhikkhu bhikkhunīhi na vanditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:558_1: Sace avandiyamāno hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā sammā vattati,
atk-vin02a4:558_3: Khamāpentena bhikkhunupassayaṃ agantvā vihāreyeva saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-vin02a4:558_4: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ bhante paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhāmi,
atk-vin02a4:558_7: Tena saṅghena vā gaṇena vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ekabhikkhunā vā sayameva gantvā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā –
atk-vin02a4:558_13: bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:559_0: “Ayaṃ ayye asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dassetīti bhikkhunisaṅghena avandiyo kato,
atk-vin02a4:559_1: so lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito accayaṃ desetvā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ khamāpesi,
atk-vin02a4:559_2: tassa ayyassa vandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
atk-vin02a4:560_0: Tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ evaṃ apalokanakammeneva vandiyo kātabbo.
atk-vin02a4:561_5: Acchinnacīvarajiṇṇacīvaranaṭṭhacīvarānañhi saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā byattena bhikkhunā yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:561_6: Appamattakavissajjakena pana cīvaraṃ karontassa senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttappabhedāni sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi dātabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:561_12: Yopi ca dubbalo vā chinniriyāpatho vā pacchinnabhikkhācārapatho vā mahāgilāno,
atk-vin02a4:561_13: tassa mahāvāsesu tatruppādato devasikaṃ nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vā ekadivasaṃyeva vā pañca vā dasa vā taṇḍulanāḷiyo
atk-vin02a4:561_15: Pesalassa bhikkhuno tatruppādato iṇapalibodhampi bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampi
atk-vin02a4:561_16: saṅghakiccaṃ karontānaṃ kappiyakārakādīnaṃ bhattavetanampi apalokanakammena dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:562_0: Catupaccayavasena dinnatatruppādato saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:562_1: “Ayaṃ bhikkhu issaravatāya vicāretī”ti kathāpacchindanatthaṃ pana salākaggādīsu vā antarasannipāte vā saṅghaṃ pucchitvāva jaggāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:562_4: “Sūro vatāyaṃ bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya dinnato āvāsaṃ jaggāpetī”ti evaṃ uppannakathāpacchedanatthaṃ pana apalokanakammameva katvā jaggāpetabbo.
atk-vin02a4:563_0: Cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā bodhigharaṃ vā āsanagharaṃ vā akataṃ vā karontena jiṇṇaṃ vā paṭisaṅkharontena
atk-vin02a4:563_1: sudhākammaṃ vā karontena manusse samādapetvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:563_4: Upanikkhepepi asati apalokanakammaṃ katvā tatruppādato kāretabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:563_6: Saṅghikena hi apaloketvā cetiyakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:563_7: Cetiyassa santakena apaloketvāpi saṅghikakiccaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:563_8: Tāvakālikaṃ pana gahetvā pākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:564_0: Cetiye sudhākammādīni karontehi pana bhikkhācārato vā saṅghato vā yāpanamattaṃ alabhantehi cetiyasantakato
atk-vin02a4:564_1: yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantehi vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-vin02a4:564_2: “vattaṃ karomā”ti macchamaṃsādīhi saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:564_3: Ye vihāre ropitā phalarukkhā saṅghena pariggahitā honti,
atk-vin02a4:564_5: yesaṃ phalāni ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjanti,
atk-vin02a4:565_0: Evañca pana kātabbaṃ, byattena bhikkhunā bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
atk-vin02a4:566_1: yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya saṅghasantakaṃ mūlatacapattaaṅkurapupphaphalakhādanīyādi atthi,
atk-vin02a4:566_2: taṃ sabbaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatīti saṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:567_1: Yasmiṃ vihāre dve tayo janā vasanti,
atk-vin02a4:567_3: Yasmiṃ pana vihāre eko bhikkhu hoti,
atk-vin02a4:567_4: tena bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi katikavattaṃ saṅghena katasadisameva hoti.
atk-vin02a4:568_0: Karontena pana phalavārena kātumpi cattāro māse cha māse ekasaṃvaccharanti evaṃ paricchinditvāpi aparicchinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a4:568_2: Aparicchinne yāva rukkhā dharanti tāva vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:568_3: Yepi tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ bījehi aññe rukkhā ropitā honti,
atk-vin02a4:569_0: Sace pana aññasmiṃ vihāre ropitā honti,
atk-vin02a4:569_3: Yepi aññato bījāni āharitvā purimavihāre pacchā ropitā,
atk-vin02a4:569_7: Sace panettha taṃ taṃ okāsaṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇāni katvā jagganti,
atk-vin02a4:569_10: tehi pana saṅghassa dasabhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
atk-vin02a4:569_11: Yopi majjhevihāre rukkhaṃ sākhāhi parivāretvā rakkhati,
atk-vin02a4:570_0: Porāṇavihāraṃ gatassa sambhāvanīyabhikkhuno “thero āgato”ti phalāphalaṃ āharanti,
atk-vin02a4:570_1: sace tattha mūle sabbapariyattidharo bahussutabhikkhu vihāsi,
atk-vin02a4:570_2: “addhā ettha dīghā katikā katā bhavissatī”ti nikkukkuccena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:570_5: Sāmaṇerā attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ bahūni phalāni denti,
atk-vin02a4:571_1: ekaṃ panasarukkhaṃ nissāya saṭṭhipi janā jīvanti,
atk-vin02a4:571_2: tādise kāle sabbesaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya bhājetvā khāditabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:571_7: Yadā samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā “ito paṭṭhāya bhājetvā khādantū”ti sāveti.
atk-vin02a4:571_8: Ekabhikkhuke pana vihāre ekena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhatiyeva.
atk-vin02a4:571_9: Sace paṭippassaddhāya katikāya sāmaṇerā neva rukkhato pātenti,
atk-vin02a4:571_12: tesaṃ dasabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva upaḍḍhaphalabhāgena phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:571_14: Puna subhikkhe jāte kappiyakārakesu āgantvā sākhāparivārādīni katvā rukkhe rakkhantesu sāmaṇerānaṃ phātikammaṃ na dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:572_0: “Vihāre phalāphalaṃ atthī”ti sāmantagāmehi manussā gilānānaṃ vā gabbhinīnaṃ vā atthāya āgantvā “ekaṃ nāḷikeraṃ detha,
atk-vin02a4:572_5: dentena pana saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:573_0: “Sāmantagāmehi manussā āgantvā gilānādīnaṃ atthāya phalāphalaṃ yācanti,
atk-vin02a4:573_6: asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ ruccati bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:574_0: Tato paṭṭhāya gilānādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā yācantā “gaṇhathā”ti na vattabbā,
atk-vin02a4:574_2: “nāḷikerādīni iminā nāma paricchedena gaṇhantānaṃ asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ kata”nti.
atk-vin02a4:574_5: Phalabhājanakāle pana āgatānaṃ sammatena upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo,
atk-vin02a4:575_0: Khīṇaparibbayo vā maggagamiyasatthavāho vā añño vā issaro āgantvā yācati,
atk-vin02a4:575_5: Puggalikapariveṇaṃ āgantvā gilānassa gāmena yācanto “amhehi chāyādīnaṃ atthāya ropitaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:576_4: Athāpi kassaci paṭibalassa bhikkhuno “imaṃ sappurisa jaggitvā dehī”ti saṅgho bhāraṃ karoti,
atk-vin02a4:576_7: Phātikammaṃ paccāsīsantassa pana tatiyabhāgena vā upaḍḍhabhāgena vā phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:576_8: “Bhāriyaṃ kamma”nti vatvā ettakena anicchanto pana sabbaṃ taveva santakaṃ katvā “mūlabhāgaṃ dasabhāgamattaṃ datvā jaggāhī”tipi vattabbo.
atk-vin02a4:576_10: So mūlabhāgaṃ datvā khādanto akatāvāsaṃ vā katvā katāvāsaṃ vā jaggitvā nissitakānaṃ ārāmaṃ niyyādeti,
atk-vin02a4:576_12: Yadā pana bhikkhū sayaṃ jaggituṃ pahonti,
atk-vin02a4:577_0: Sace pana neva vattasīsena jagganto atthi,
atk-vin02a4:577_3: eko anāpucchitvāva jaggitvā phātikammaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccāsīsati,
atk-vin02a4:578_5: āgacchāhīti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa osāraṇā osāraṇā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:579_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko imassa neva suttaṃ āgacchati,
atk-vin02a4:579_3: so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-vin02a4:579_5: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti evaṃ ubbāhikāvinicchaye dhammakathikassa
atk-vin02a4:580_3: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
atk-vin02a4:581_3: saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:582_17: itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
atk-vin02a4:583_1: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:583_3: saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti.
atk-vin02a4:583_5: āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:584_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati, vivarati,
atk-vin02a4:584_9: Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsīti evaṃ āpattipaṭiggaho paṭiggaho nāma.
atk-vin02a4:585_7: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kāḷaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ,
atk-vin02a4:585_8: āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā –
atk-vin02a4:585_14: āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti evaṃ katā pavāraṇāpaccukkaḍḍhanā paccukkaḍḍhanā nāma.
atk-vin02a4:586_1: sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
atk-vin02a4:586_3: saṅgho amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ viharataṃ bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:586_4: Sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma,
atk-vin02a4:586_5: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya.
atk-vin02a4:586_7: saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ,
atk-vin02a4:586_8: ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisayutta”nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathena katvā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:587_0: Tathā tato parā ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ katvā dve ñattiyo iti yathāvuttappabhedaṃ osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ…pe…
atk-vin02a4:587_1: kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti ñattikammaṃ imāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-vin02a4:588_0: Ñattidutiyakammaṭṭhānabhede pana vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā.
atk-vin02a4:588_1: Tasseva pattukkujjanavasena vuttā osāraṇā ca veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:589_12: ārāmikapesakasāmaṇerapesakasammutīti etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena sammuti veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:590_2: Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tisso ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā,
atk-vin02a4:590_3: ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekāti dve ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā,
atk-vin02a4:590_5: Iti ñattidutiyakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-vin02a4:591_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede pana tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena nissāraṇā,
atk-vin02a4:591_1: tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:591_6: yāvatatiyakā ariṭṭho caṇḍakāḷī ca ime te yāvatatiyakā”ti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā.
atk-vin02a4:591_8: Iti ñatticatutthakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-vin02a4:592_1: Iti kammāni ca kammavipattiñca vipattivirahitānaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānapabhedagamanañca dassetvā idāni tesaṃ
atk-vin02a4:592_2: kammānaṃ kārakassa saṅghassa paricchedaṃ dassento puna “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:595_1: Idāni yāni tāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ vatthubhūtāni sikkhāpadāni,
atk-vin02a4:595_2: tesaṃ paññattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “dve atthavase paṭiccā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:595_3: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ verānaṃ saṃvarāyāti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaverānaṃ saṃvaratthāya pidahanatthāya.
atk-vin02a4:595_4: Samparāyikānaṃ verānaṃ paṭighātāyāti vipākadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ samparāyikaverānaṃ paṭighātatthāya,
atk-vin02a4:595_6: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ vajjānaṃ saṃvarāyāti tesaṃyeva pañcannaṃ verānaṃ saṃvaratthāya.
atk-vin02a4:595_8: Vipākadukkhāneva hi idha vajjanīyabhāvato vajjānīti vuttāni.
atk-vin02a4:595_9: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ bhayānanti garahā upavādo tajjanīyādīni kammāni uposathapavāraṇānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ akittipakāsanīyakammanti
atk-vin02a4:595_18: Pāpicchānaṃ pakkhupacchedāyāti pāpicchapuggalānaṃ gaṇabandhabhedanatthāya gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:597_1: Pātimokkhādīsu pātimokkhuddesoti bhikkhūnaṃ pañcavidho bhikkhunīnaṃ catubbidho.
atk-vin02a4:597_2: Parivāsadānādīsu osāraṇīyaṃ paññattanti aṭṭhārasasu vā tecattālīsāya vā vattesu vattamānassa osāraṇīyaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-vin02a4:597_5: Nissāraṇīyaṃ paññattanti bhaṇḍanakārakādayo yena kammena nissārīyanti,
atk-vin02a4:598_1: Apaññattetiādīsu apaññatte paññattanti sattāpattikkhandhā kakusandhañca sammāsambuddhaṃ koṇāgamanañca
atk-vin02a4:598_2: kassapañca sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā antarā kenaci apaññatte sikkhāpade paññattaṃ nāma.
atk-vin02a4:600_1: Idāni sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ ekekena ākārena navadhā saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ “nava saṅgahā”tiādimāha.
atk-vin02a4:600_5: yasmā hi ekasikkhāpadampi avatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a4:600_6: tasmā sabbāni vatthunā saṅgahitānīti evaṃ tāva vatthusaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:601_0: Yasmā pana dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipattiyā saṅgahitā,
atk-vin02a4:601_3: tasmā sabbānipi vipattiyā saṅgahitānīti evaṃ vipattisaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:602_0: Yasmā pana sattahāpattīhi muttaṃ ekasikkhāpadampi natthi,
atk-vin02a4:602_1: tasmā sabbāni āpattiyā saṅgahitānīti evaṃ āpattisaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:603_0: Sabbāni ca sattasu nagaresu paññattānīti nidānena saṅgahitānīti evaṃ nidānasaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:604_0: Yasmā pana ekasikkhāpadampi ajjhācārikapuggale asati paññattaṃ natthi,
atk-vin02a4:604_1: tasmā sabbāni puggalena saṅgahitānīti evaṃ puggalasaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-vin02a4:605_0: Sabbāni pana pañcahi ceva sattahi ca āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitāni,
atk-vin02a4:605_1: sabbāni na vinā chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhantīti samuṭṭhānena saṅgahitāni.
atk-vin02a4:605_2: Sabbāni ca catūsu adhikaraṇesu āpattādhikaraṇena saṅgahitāni.
atk-vin02a4:605_3: Sabbāni sattahi samathehi samathaṃ gacchantīti samathehi saṅgahitāni.
atk-vin02a4:612_0: Vinayapiṭakaṃ vinento, veneyyaṃ yaṃ jino āha.
atk-vin02a4:620_0: Sampassataṃ na dissati, kiñci apāsādikaṃ yato ettha;
atk-vin02a4:652_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
atk-vin02a4:653_0: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medininti.
atk-vin02a4:654_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-vin02a4:654_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ samantapāsādikā nāma vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā –
